khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de lta bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po

yang mi 'greng bdun tsam du me tog man dA ra bas rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /spos chus kyang rdzab tu gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

'di'i sems can gang dag gis spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa dag ni smos kyang mi dgos so/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs

ris rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub dam pa don du gnyer slad du/ /skyabs kyi dam pa rab tu mi sgul ba/ /lhar

bcas 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol ba po/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs song na/ /log ltung dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /dpe med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du'o/ /'khor ba'i

sdug bsngal dag ni bshig bcom zhing / /mya ngan las rgal nyon mongs dag gyur la/ /'dren pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /rga dang 'chi bas nyen par gyur pa yi/ /lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das/ /gang la skyabs

song phyis kyang mi skye ba/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe rta'i rgyan de dag dang / shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dag dang / gdugs dang /

rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan de dag dang / bla re dang dril bu g.yer ka'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad pa mkhas pas sgra phyung ba bzhin no/ /de ltar

lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe steng gi bar snang las lha'i tsan dan dang / ud pa la dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi spos kyi phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs

du ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang /

skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab bo/ /steng gi bar snang las gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad

kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par bab bo/ /spos chu'i char de bab pas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chu'i rdzab tu gyur to/ /spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum

gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom

ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed pa'i tshe/ bar snang las lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo / /sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to/ /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gang

dag gis sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya

stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir la la ni glu len/ la la ni sil snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang / ud pa la dang / a ga ru

dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / man dzu Sha ka dang / man dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar

chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / sbug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang rin po che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par

'thor ro/ /la la ni na bza' dang / rkang gdub dang / sku rags dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang /

gya do dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs dang / rna cha dang / rna cha gdub kor dang / tshong tshong gshibs pa dang / mgo rgyan dang / phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lda ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing me tog gi bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu'i bla re dag thogs so/ /la la ni spos

chu'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /la la ni rin po ches snyim pa bkang / la la ni gser gyis snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /tshigs su

bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ /gang brten gang la gnas bcas nas/ /gang zag mchog la mchod 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang / /rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog /lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim

gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'jigs

'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la ma 'dres nges par gyur pa po/ /'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthar phyin thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba bying

ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa mi mnga' zhing / /'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol te/ /pad ma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba bo/ /blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid mkhyen/ /rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams

cad bshig /khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'/ /mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun

gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing gser phye dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sa dang bar snang dang ni lha'i yul na'ang / /bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis/ /

mtshan mar gzung nas phyin ci log zhugs pa'i/ /'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /'di na byed pa tshor ba sems can med/ /gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med/ /chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun las dben/ /rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan/ /su zhig

bde gshegs bstan pa 'dir mos te/ /chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste/ /ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod/ /rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nams gang skyes de/ /ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen

pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir/ /'gro la stsal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ //bam po gsum pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs

ldan gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chu las pha

rol rnams rgal ba/ /rgal nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing / /bde gshegs pha rol thang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa/ /spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtugs/ /blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen/ /phyin ci log lta thibs por rab zhen

blo ldan te/ /'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad/ /mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang / /smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs zhes rab tu bstan/ /thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi

sras mchog bskyed/ /srid pa gsum po dag ni mi chags spyad pa spyod/ /dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang / /gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen/ /byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bur/ /mi dbang khyod kyis sras kyis tshal na spyad pa spyod/ /

lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te tshigs su bcad pa

dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di zil mnan/ /ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang / /rgya mtshos ba rjes chu bzhin no/ /gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /gzugs kyis

gzugs kyi dam pa dang / /gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan/ /dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin/ /gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis/ /sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan/ /zil mnan de dag lam me min/ /nyi mas me khyer zil brlag

bzhin/ /ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis/ /'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan/ /zil mnan de dag lam me min/ /nyi mas zla 'od zil brlag bzhin/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis

kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /'dren pa blo gros

zhi ba bo/ /zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi/ /'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad/ /char pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin/ /'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad/ /blugs sbyin gyis ni me bzhin no/ /nags btang nags mes shing sreg ltar/ /de bzhin nyon

mongs dra ba sreg /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /dpag tu med par dge rtsa 'dzin/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad de/ /bdud rtsis lus byugs dug bzhin no/ /mun pa mun nag sel mdzad de/ /mun khung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin/ /chos kyi tshul yang ston

mdzad de/ /nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das

la lan gsum skor ba byed cing rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gdul dka' mi bzad sems ni khyod kyis btul/ /g.yul la dpa' bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo

bzhin/ /shin tu tshar bcad rang gis dbang du mdzad/ /thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dgra yang bcom/ /gang du'ang mi bsnyengs mi bskyod bde ba brnyes/ /khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs/ /rnam

pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom/ /mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te/ /khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam/ /thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig /'gro ba kun du khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'/ /shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred pa

bskams/ /shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag /chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'/ /thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po

mig kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po yang phul nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod

pa/ dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni/ /chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /gang 'di chos zhes brjod pa yang / /de ni brdar btags tshig tu zad/ chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis/ /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so/ /gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang / /

de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs/ /ming ni ming gis dben pa ste/ /mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste/ /ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad/ /rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang / /bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te/ /gang gis kyang ni

ma bshad cing / /su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so/ /khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams/ /chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni/ /chos rnams la yang mi chags par/ /rnam par spyad do thub pa che/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig ji ltar byas pa de

bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas tshigs

su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod do/ /tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs/ /de ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/ /de phyir khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis/ /khyod

kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na/ /gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/ /dpe byad phun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag /tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyod do/ /skye bo

mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang / /khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag /mi yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor/ /shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis/ /de na mi bsnyengs 'jig rten gsum btul nas/ /'khor du seng ge lta bur sgra

bsgrags te/ /rtog ge tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la

zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing rin po ches snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa chen po skye bo'i tshogs pa 'di/ /dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /kun gyis rgyal ba

mdun na bzhugs par mthong / /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/ /skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal/ /thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung / /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma

'dres mtshan/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/ /'khor gyis tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing / /'gro bas rang don ci lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal/ /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni/ /gcig la

'jog gi gzhan ni dgag par mdzad/ /'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtog par mdzad/ /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang bzung gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la

mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang / /

yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi/ /blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te/ /mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras/ /chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te/ /rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra/ /

rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis/ /de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs/ /ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu yi zla ba 'dra/ /byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyi/ /gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo

mnga' ba/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang / /mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yod mi mchi/ /chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas/ /yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin

thob par gyur/ /de nas thags zangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis mchod pa 'di lta bu byas nas byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te thal mo

sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa

mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang /

shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las

langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/ 'jig rten phan bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par/ /

mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ /lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas/ /'jig rten phan bzhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na/ /lha min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal

gsol/ /de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /de ring su yis dogs med rgya chen sems/ /'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /de ring yongs su dag pa'i

yid kyis su/ /mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen te/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/ /'di ltar bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa

'di/ /su yi dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes/ /'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i som nyi bcad du gsol/ /mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi/ /the tshom smyur te legs par bcad du gsol/ /de

nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa/ /de yis 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya/ /bstan pa de ni rtse

gcig yid kyis nyon/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ /lha min rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas te/ /de dag sems ni ci la'ang chags med pas/ /nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin/ /lha min tshogs kyis dad pa'i yid byas te/ /de dag nga la mchod pa 'di

byas pas/ /blo can de dag lha min ris bor te/ /mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/ /de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi'i seng ge /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba snyed/ /bsnyen bkur byas nas yid 'ong bskal pa la/ /de dag thams cad mtshan 'thun rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de tshe bde

gshegs khrag khrig drug cu'i rnams/ /'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su grags pa ste/ /de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing / /shin tu yangs shing snyigs ma med par 'gyur/ /de tshe

khrag khrig drug cur tshangs pa yi/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur/ /de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad/ /de dag zhing der dga' bar spyod par 'gyur/ /brtan pa de dag mi khom thams cad sbyong / /bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur/ /de dag tshe yi

tshad du gyur pa ni/ /bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang / /rnam par 'dren pa de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad/ /thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur te/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu zhi gyur nas/ /bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni/ /

rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul/ /dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan 'thun 'gyur/ /zhing dang tshe dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang 'thun/ /bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug cu yi/ /

skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad de/ /bla na med pa'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin/ /rgyal bas lha min de dag lung bstan pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsungs/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas/ /yi

rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skye bar gyur/ /lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'di mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa

spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba ci lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzad na 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa grub snyam nas/ de'i tshe sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pas bskal pa grangs med pa yang rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang der 'chi 'pho dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang

dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag

go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi

bye ma snyed na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang de dag gi thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang lan lon par mi

nus so snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob par gyur nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi/ /thugs bskyed pa ni re re la'ang / /lha ma yin gyi mchod pa

'dis/ /cha tsam mi spyod mi'i seng ge /de lta'i yon tan mthar phyin te/ /lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa/ /tsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam/ /mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os/ /mi yi seng ge khyod la ni/ /gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /rgya mtsho rab tu bkang ba yi/ /spos chu dag gi

mchod par 'os/ /yon tan chen po mnga' ba la/ /gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /me tog tshogs ni ri bo mchog /khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os/ /rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba/ /mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam/ /'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi/ /mar me rnams kyis mchod par

'os/ /mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur/ /yon tan pha rol phyin gyur ba/ /gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os/ /mi dbang mchod pas thugs brtse ba/ /rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis/ /bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang / /sems can mchog

la mchod par 'os/ /yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod/ /rin po che yi rgyal mtshan gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste/ /bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os/ /mi yi seng ge khyod la ni/ /bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par/ /gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /

ba dan tshogs kyis mchod par 'os/ /drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag /lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang / /gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa/ /brtag bzung dpe la gsan du gsol/ /gal te gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ /sems can thams

cad sangs rgyas su/ /mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la/ /de dag re re'i mgo bo yang / /gang gA'i bye ma snyed gyur te/ /mgo bo de dag re re zhing / /de snyed kha dang ldan gyur la/ /kha rnams de dag re re zhing / /lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /

bskal par bstod par bgyis kyang ni/ /rgyal ba de dag spobs mi bas/ /khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin/ /rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi/ /pha rol tu ni phyin par gyur/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so legs so/ /nga'i

nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa/ ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/ chos su gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ de dag ni nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha stag go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang

ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin

gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa gang gA'i

klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyi tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ bsams kyang bsam par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can gang ji

snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ni tshad med pas sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / /sems can gyi khams

ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / /sems de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du skyes pas sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan

lon par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol

bar 'gyur zhes te zang zing med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa/ bgrang du

med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul

ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed pa re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can

rnams la phan par dgongs par gyur te don kyang mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te/ yongs su dag cing ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/

de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye ba yong med par gyur to/ lta ba'i rnam pa yong med par gyur to/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yong med par gyur to/ /lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag pa dang

ldan pa'i sems can yong med par gyur to/ /ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la btsud cing btams te rjes su bstan cing bslabs

pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde

ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la/ bde ba de dag la yang

mngon par zhen pa med par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snang la

yang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa yang med do/ /de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med

rmongs par 'gyur ba med de/ gzhan du na yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba sha stag la yongs su spyod de/ de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa

spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dge ba las yongs su bzlog ste/ dge ba la btsud pas de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yong med de/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi

'byung ngo / /de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'du ma byas te/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal

yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa de mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro/ /rlung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo / /char

nyams su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bstan cing bshad pas sems can de dag gis

kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bsgrubs pas las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba'am yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do/ rmongs

pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do/ /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa yang med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i

sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des btams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to/ /de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba

mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du 'greng pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la ya nga ba ma spangs pa med de/ de'i phyir ya nga ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung

ngo / /yang dag pa'i spang ba yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de/ de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/ /sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /

de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams

cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/ /sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyu ba

med pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe des

gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung

ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par bsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can de snyed cig don bya ba'am/ de

dag la phan par bsams pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bka'

stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ sems zhan pa dang / sems dma' ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde bar bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal

bsal ba'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dad pa zhan pa nas

nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang / tshul khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang / thos pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhan pa nas nyes

bar bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde bsgrub pa'am/

sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so legs

so/ /de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / sems zhan pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su

bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par bsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde bar

bsgrubs pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus so/ /dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba

byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod do/ de na de

bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos ston gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa

dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi

khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga 'dir gnas par gyur to/ /des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni bcom ldan

'das bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi

mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na/ rgyal ba gtso bo/ rgyal ba dam pa/

rgyal ba mchog /rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid lags par yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do/ /de skad ces smras nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dpa' bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te/ /

sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing / /sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir/ /dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul/ /bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang / /da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal/ /byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug /stong

gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi /sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad pas/ /ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa/ /rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal/ /da dung dang po thugs bskyed par/ /de dang der ni yongs bstan te/ /da dung du yang 'dren pa khyod/ /sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad/ /

rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'/ /khyod kyi gang yang mkhyen mdzad de/ /brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / /la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis/ /sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ /'jig rten

rnams kyis rtogs mi nus/ /bud med cha byad spyod pa mdzad/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'/ /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te/ /pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/ /'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi/ /'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad/ /des na skye dgu 'di

dag rnams/ /gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod/ /la lar bltam pa yongs su bstan/ /la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan/ /la la na ni 'khor lo skor/ /la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad/ /sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du/ /dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad/ /

bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad/ /sems can sus kyang yong ma 'tshal/ /'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i tshul/ /'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar/ /sems can rnam par gdul don du/ /'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/ /rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan

te/ /byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis/ /sems can rnam par gdul slad du/ /'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/ /smyos pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul/ /zha ba ma lags zha ba ltar/ /rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad/ /de ltar

bsam yas mgon po khyod/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig /sngon byung ba 'od srung chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma

yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba

blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to/ /lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba

ris bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel lo/ gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdang bu rnams ni gser/ shar ba rnams ni dngul/ dngul

gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni dngul/ shar ba rnams ni gser/ bai dUr+ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu ni bai dUr+ya/ shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o/ /khang pa brtsegs

pa de dag dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/ /khang pa

brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang / bai dUr+ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang / spug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par gyur to/ /gdugs bkra ba/ blta na

sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go /rgyal mtshan bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang / dngul dang /

bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po can sha stag mngon par sprul to/ /ba dan kha dog sna tshogs

can bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur to/ /bla re bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur te/ bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang / dngul skud kyi bla re dang / bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig

dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste/ rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go /de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong

po de dag dang / ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni sum

cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing nam mkha' las song ste/ yongs 'dus brtol du gzhog go /de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan

gsum skor ba byed par gyur to/ /de nas 'dab brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

mngon par bstod pa/ rga dang 'chi las rnam bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rga dang 'chi las rnam 'grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can gzhal yas kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so/ /bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu yi lus

ldan zhing / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar gyur par shog /bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing / /mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te/ /spyod

lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing / /'gro ba rnams sbyong mya ngan zlo bar shog /bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing / /shes rab ldan pas mchog tu gyur par shog /de ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur/ /skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub par shog /'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa

khyod lta bur/ /bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang / /ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing / /'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog /bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang / /rmi 'dra sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang / /brag ca nam mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing / /

ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po 'dab de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams/ /

rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa/ /'jig rten phan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs/ /'dab rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te/ /bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyed/ /rkang gnyis

dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/ /'gro ba thams cad thal mo rab sbyar cing / /dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod/ /mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal/ /rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/ /mi mchog khyod la khong dag mchi ba ni/ /'gro ba thams cad the

tshom med 'gyur zhing / /the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis shes mchi/ /'khor 'dir 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal nas/ /rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mngon dga' ste/ /slob ma mchog la bla

mas bstan pa bzhin/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol/ /rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su smon pa mdzod/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'di 'dus gyur gyis/ /rang byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka'

stsal pa/ thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden/ /rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs/ /'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis/ /'dab 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa/ /de yi

'bras bu dga' ba'i yid kyis nyon/ /the tshom sol la rab tu dga' ba skyed/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing / /stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis/ /'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir/ /'dab chags dbang pos nga la mchod legs byas/ /ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi/ /

sred med bu lus shin tu mkhregs pa dang / /sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams/ /yongs su btsal phyir nga la mchod pa byas/ /rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang / /gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang / /phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnam dgrol ba/ /'di dag kun btsal don

du mchod pa byas/ /de dag nga la dga' bas mchod byas pas/ /dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas/ /lha dang brtul zhugs 'thun par de dag 'dong / /'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin/ /bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing / /rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha'

yas mchod byas nas/ /de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste/ /mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med/ /rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes/ /ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal la rang byung 'gyur/ /lo ni bye ba brgyad cu bzhi bgrangs par/ /'jig rten phan phyir

'dren pa de dag bzhugs/ /'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhag pas/ /lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur/ /skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi /'dus pa nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad cur 'gyur/ /de tshe skyob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi/ /shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung / /'dren pa

de dag 'gro ba'i nga bsal phyir/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur/ /mi dag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal che/ /'dab lus su gyur nas stobs po che/ /'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na/ /drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshogs can gyur/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshang ba ste/ /dka' thub spyod

de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis/ /dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur/ /tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dab tu/ /tshe zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig /nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes/ /tshul

khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dad/ /nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //bam po bzhi pa/ de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po de

dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dag dga' mgu yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs bai dUr+ya'i dra ba lda ldir

bkye ba mu tig dmar po'i dra bas bskor ba/ gser gyi yu ba can/ bai dUr+ya'i thur ma brgya stong bkye ba/ rin po che chun po sbyangs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /rta sngon po kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/ bai dUr+ya'i srab kyis bsrabs

pa/ bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /nor bu skar mdog gi bla re kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod la/ des 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa cig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul to/ /de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba mig tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug

bres par mngon par sprul to/ /bla re de'i kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sprul te bres so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung rkang dag mngon par sprul to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /de nas klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhon nas

rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te/ nam mkha' las 'dong zhing rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag dkrol cing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed pa lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ lha'i a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang /

ud pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ me tog ud pa la dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji

ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byas so/ /de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag gis rol mo'i sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ nor bu skar mdog gi bla re dag dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag dang / khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa

mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la de lta bur yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to/ /sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te/ me tog gi char de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngad byung ste/ 'gro zhing ldog go /spos chu'i char de bab pas

kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chu'i rdzab tu gyur te/ spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rgyan thams

cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /

klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yi rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su/ /byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas/ /rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchod cing rab tu

dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral/ /rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te/ /kha dog sngo zhing rgyan yang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan/ /de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub la rta yis mchod pa byed/ /klu yi bu mo

de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis/ /mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa byas/ /sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum

grag /sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i dpag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur/ /nor bu rin chen skar ma'i

mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal/ /klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas/ /gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing / /'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa

grub par shog /ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grol ba ltar/ /chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol/ /chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing dbu ba lta bur nyam chung la/ /char rgyun chu

la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad brtags nas ni/ /'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi /sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ /

skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa/ /byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs/ /de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan/ /ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'khrigs gyur na ri

ltar gda' ba yang / /yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis/ /de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid/ /shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/ /yang dag tu na 'gro ba

thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas/ /des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdzab la zam pa 'dra/ /'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang / /de lta

lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon/ /skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod/ /sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral

'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /'jig rten na ni 'jig rten

mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad/ /dpal stug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yongs ma mthong / /mi yi dbang po dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs/ /de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa/ /dri

za rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen/ /rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yong ma mchis/ /de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis

ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yi rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur/ /thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi/ /'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /

kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung / /'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te/ /sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos

la som nyi gang 'tshal ba/ /de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol/ /drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsal the tshom khum/ /rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul/ /su zhig yid rab tshim nas

bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ /'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol/ /thos nas bdag cag yi rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/ /'dzum

rgyu dga' ba skyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs

su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris/ /klu yi bu mos mchod tshe 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ /de yi 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon/ /gang gi

don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon/ /klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam bshig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas/ /'di na byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med/ /

chos rnams 'di dag zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag ngas shes te/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong legs/ /mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod

pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra/ /byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong / /nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong shes pas/ /klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha

yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas/ /ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha yi gnas su lha yi dga' ba spyod/ /lhar gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de ni tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i

sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshad zad pa dang / /dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dag de na lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod/ /pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas/ /

'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/ /skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams/ /de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyod nas ni/ /tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar

'gyur/ /bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te/ /mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe tshad bar tu gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni/ /mkhas pa tshe zad blo gros ldan pa chos

kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas/ /'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can/ /chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag lha gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs

ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs/ /bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan

'bras bu spyad gyur nas/ /der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag bskal par tshangs gnas 'thun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang / /thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed/ /mkhas thub de dag de na bsam

gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med/ /bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi/ /kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan/ /mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po

byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba/ /tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas/ /kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir/ /rang 'byung dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston/ /tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro

ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nges 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la/ /ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston/ /de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten

dag la byang chub phyir/ /phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod/ /rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab dag dang lha min bcas pa

dang / /dri za grul bum mi'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyangs chos kyis stobs rnyed pa/ /de dag thams cad yi rangs thal sbyar bde bar gshegs la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //

de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos/ yongs su rdzogs par yang rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing bcom

ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa'am/ ma gsan pa'am/ mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang med cing bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ rims nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams

kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o/ /'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ rgod pa/ mi brten pa/ mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi

slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ 'thun par zhugs pa/ 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/ ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis

bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so/ /spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/

sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub

tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal par bkang ngo / /klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang

mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo / /klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi phye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang bai dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to/ /'dun khang de'i gzhi yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur

to/ /'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/ mi

dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas nor bu la la las ni me 'byung / la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/ de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog ser po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dkar

po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo / nor bu la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la la las ni de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung / la la ni snum gyi bya ba byed/ la la ni me long gi bya ba byed de 'khor de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i

nang du snang bar gyur to/ /ser skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa

yang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/ /'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon par gyur to/ /rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna

tshogs dang / rin po che'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog brtsegs ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' la sogs pa klu

bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du dkri ste rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par

'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu bo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum

bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ cang mi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rjes su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzums par lta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par

gyur to/ /de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan

lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ /mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa/ /dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can/ /rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te/ bde gshegs khyod ni grong khyer mngon par byung / /lo drug bar du

dka' thub dka' mdzad de/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang / /bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur/ /thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad/ /ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod/ /'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de/ /'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btang gyur pa/ /

de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ /thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang / /byang chub sems ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa/ /bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe ka ling rgyal pos bzod smra ba'i/ /zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs

gyur te/ /de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ /phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma btang ste/ /gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la gcal gyur pa/ /rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste/ /bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che/ /bdag cag mi 'tshal

ma lags ci zhe na/ /bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyid pa/ /ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi/ /sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang / /bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang / /sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyod

bde bka' stsal gsol/ /mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la/ /thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson/ /ji ltar khyod kyi bka' bzhin spyod 'gyur ba/ /de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol/ /rga shi ma mchis go 'phang 'thob 'tshal zhing / /klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa skom par gnas/ /

'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /brtul zhugs spyod bde bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni chos nyid de sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i

tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa'i rnams/ /rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba/ /mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni/ /'dzum rgyu nyan

'tshal khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis/ /mkhas pa the tshom rnam par bsal du gsol/ /'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub/ /de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dga'/ /gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te/ /rmongs par bgyis nas yid mi dga' bar bgyis/ /tshogs kyi

slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis/ /bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ /shAkya seng ge bka' stsol the tshom khum/ /sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing / /'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du lta/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal

du gsol/ /'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ /de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar gyur te/ /rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na/ /gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta

thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis/ /tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis/ /rta thul skyon med sems kyis dad byos la/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par gyis/ /klu yi bdag po 'di dag dad gyur te/ /'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas

mchod pa byas/ /skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs su tshol/ /snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi/ /'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten/ /'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la/ /'dren pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur/ /zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes

stobs ldan stobs/ /mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa/ /rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su/ /shin tu yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro/ /'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te/ /gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas/ /mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang

snying rje thob/ /'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can/ /'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas/ /de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing / /'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste/ /de

dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob/ /de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med/ /'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi/ /rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed/ /bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang / /bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur/ /srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad

spyod cing / /rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur/ /mtshungs med thob pa bde bar myur du yang / /yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur/ /thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur/ /skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan/ /'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi /dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur/ /

phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag /rang byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur/ /de dag kun du chos rtogs dran dang ldan/ /bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med 'thob par 'gyur/ /de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni/ /bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med/ /bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi/ /'gro ba 'chi med yang dag

thob par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs/ /rga ba dang ni na dang 'chi ba dang / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su 'grol/ /tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur/ /klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng ge la/ /yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams/ /gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi/ /ye shes 'jug

'gyur de skad sras la bstan/ /klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste/ /de la yid ni rab tu zhi gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song / /klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas grul bum bye ba phrag brgyad kyi lha ma yin rnams dang / nam

mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la

mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye

shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhes kyang mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar shin du che'o snyam mo/ /de nas grul bum bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re bye ba phrag brgyad mngon

par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag go /rin po che'i bla re de dag la yang me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni dngul gyi me

tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ /dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ bai dUr+ya'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla re rnams la ni bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni spug gi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ spug gi bla re rnams

la ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du'o/ /shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs

thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bai dUr+ya'i yu ba can dang / shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul to/ /gdugs de dag la yang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / shel

gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lda ldi sha stag go /mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi phreng ba de dag gi gzungs byas so/ /grul bum gyi rol mo'i sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag re

re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla re dang / me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to/ /

bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can/ /thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste/ /ri yi rgyal po lhun po'i

ri 'dra ba/ /mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang / /tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'/ /'dren pa khyod kyi ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas/ /shes rab ldan la dregs pa yong mi mnga'/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen/ /rang bzhin

stong ste rmi lam dga' 'dra dang / /chu zla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bur ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs/ /dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang / /grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med/ /gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste/ /de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs/ /mchod pa 'di kun brag

ca ji bzhin te/ /shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang / /me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa/ /brag ca ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'/ /'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang / /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog /rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis/ /rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin
