bstan par bgyi/ /na dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i/ /skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / /byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas/ /gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par bgyi/ /bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi/ /thub pa 'khrugs med

chos rnams rab ston pa/ /mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ /rnam 'dren

'jig rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'/ /ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na/ /'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsol nyan par 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas/ /'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal/ /the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum/ /mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ /

gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag gyur/ /de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yang mthong / /deng dus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis/ /mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas/ /gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid gcig bcom/ /gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi

g.yo gnas/ /rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom/ /thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes bar bgyis/ /'dren pa su zhig de ring gting rnyed gyur/ /the tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal/ /'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnyan slad du/ /'gro ba kun kyang thal

mo sbyar cing gnas/ /'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom sol/ /rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na/ /'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis

byas par gyur/ /de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /grul bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod byas te/ /zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag /mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngom gyur te/ /zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag /de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchod de/ /zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang / /lam stor skye bo

rnams la snying brtse zhing / /bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed/ /snying rje bas na nga la mchod pa byas/ /rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsams/ /mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na/ /grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzang / /brgya byin lha yi drung du 'dong bar 'gyur/ /thugs rje byams don mdzad skyob

drung du'ang 'dong / /de ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te/ /phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur/ /de dag bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing / /bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa byed/ go cha chen po rab tu bgos yid kyis/ /de dag skyo ba med par 'jig rten khams/ /khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam

par spyod par 'gyur/ /skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te/ /ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba/ /der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes/ /de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na/ /ngo mtshar med par skyo bo rnam grol byed/ rgyal ba ngo mtshar med par zhing sbyong zhing / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub

bla med zhi ba tshol/ /de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te/ /'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro/ /de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing / /bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te/ /grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thos nas/ /'gro ba the tshom bsal te dga' bar gyur/ /grul bum

lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams dang / grul bum rnams kyis mchod

pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med par yang yang dag par bka' stsal/ bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la/ chos gang la yang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do snyam nas de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu mos par gyur te/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa

drug drug mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ so re re la yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re zhing yang pad ma bdun bdun/ pad ma re re zhing 'dab ma bye ba phrag stong stong / 'dab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis

brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa bdun bdun zhing pad ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to/ /glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag gi mgo bo re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs nas rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gzungs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun

gyi lda ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul to/ /glang po che'i mgo thams cad la yang lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul te/ de nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la

zhon te/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan len cing nam mkha' las rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan sum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas lha'i tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang / lha'i ta ma la'i lo ma

dang / ud pa la'i phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog mAn dA ra ba dang / mAn dA ra ba chen po dang / man dzu Sha ka dang / man dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das

la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/

mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /spos kyi bla re de dag las spos kyi ngad 'byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go /lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par bab bo/ /spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug

cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos chu'i rdzab de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir glang po che sa srung gi bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la lha'i bu mo glu len pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun

par byas so/ /lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor/ la la ni me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba

chen po nas/ skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni gser gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che snyim pas blangs te/ bcom ldan

'das la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni na bza' dag 'thor/ la la ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang / sku rags dang / gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bul lo/ /la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin/ la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba

dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu de dag

la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad

pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan bde gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa/ /srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol mdzad/ /khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'/ /mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di steng du/ /

grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan/ /'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la/ /dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod/ /bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ /brjed pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis/ /tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma

mchis/ /'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni 'gro ba sbyang / /bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ong med dang / /gnas med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang / /chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan/ /rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan/ /chos rnams gang yang bya ba

byed ma mchis/ /'jig rten gtso bos bya ba'ang yongs su bstan/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan/ /shing rta'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dag /bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang / /shing rta'i bgyi

ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /chos ni chos la yongs su skul mi bgyid/ /chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis/ /chos rnams chos la nye bar mi rten te/ /chos rnams gang yang ma skyes 'chi ma mchis/ /'gro

ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs/ /kun rdzob de yang de na ma mchis te/ /'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs/ /mig gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la/ /bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par

gzhag /chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na/ /'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad/ /de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te/ /nor ba'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams/ /chos kyis chos kyi tshul la gzung bgyis te/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi

med thob par bgyi/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyed ni ci 'dra bar/ /'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas/ /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog /ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /

nga rgyal bsgribs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgyad ldan yongs su dgrol/ /ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la/ /g.yo yi zhags pas zin

cing mu ma mthong / /yongs 'thom spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su dgrol/ /ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi/ /lha tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing / /bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chud gzon dgrol/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum

pa mdzad/ /'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na/ /bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs/ /nem nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tshom sol/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas/ /skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par 'gyur/ /'dzum pa'i don ni de dag nyan

par 'tshal/ /thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs/ /the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad/ /su zhig

bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du/ /blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur/ /gang gis blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste/ /bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas

thos par dga'/ /sor bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing / /dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du lta/ /nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa/ /dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten mig /'gro ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol/ /rgyal ba

thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis don dris 'thun zhing legs pa ste/ /'dzum pa de yi don ni lung bstan pas/ /skye

bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel/ /'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /de ni ma log par yang ngas bstan gyis/ /bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes snyegs shing / /bde

bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas/ /chos nyid byung bar gyur pa med pa ste/ /chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin/ /rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas/ /rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur/ /gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba/ /des ni de nyid stong

zhes bde gshegs gsungs/ /de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas/ /rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas/ /byang chub rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing / /dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do/ /nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag

mos/ /'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas/ /dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te/ /blo gros bzang rnams lha gnas lha yul ba/ /brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchodabyed 'gyur/ /

zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing / /de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan/ /de dag bde gshegs spyod pa yongs su sbyong / /de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni/ /khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston/ /'gro ba 'di

dag rang bzhin stong rig nas/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa/ /rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i/ /

bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston/ /rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis/ /de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan/ /rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa/ /dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad/ /dri za

lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur ba/ /de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'/ /der ni bde bar gshegs kyi gsung thos nas/ /shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong / /dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //'phags pa yab dang sras

mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ /de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing

dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos pas ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/ de dag gi bcom

ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

mngon par bstod pa/ mngon shes stobs ni kun du mtha' yas te/ /rgya mtsho chu 'dzin bas ma 'tshal dang 'dra/ /de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa/ /mi yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod/ /ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'/ /gzi brjid chen po

nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'/ /shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs/ /tshad gzung dpag par nus pa yong ma mchis/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su chud/ /skye bo drang rung mi rung gdul min pa/ /de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen/ /de

bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /de dag ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang / /de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang / /de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod/ /

mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen/ /phrag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyud gar 'khyams pa/ /de dag mtshungs med khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /de la ye shes rgyun tu rab 'byung bas/ /de

bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs/ /chud za'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing / /byams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa/ /de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ /'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas

shing / /ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang / /lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams/ /de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ /mi yi seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang / /gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar/ /gang la rten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas

rab tu gzigs/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis/ /ci 'dra'i lam la de dag bsten bgyis shing / /ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen/ /byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la/ /rab tu byung zhing 'jig

rten mkhas pa yis/ /bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas/ /dmyal ba chen por ji srid gnas pa dang / /ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams

kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dad bskyed de/ /rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing / /chos kun stong pa nyid du rab brtags nas/ /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shing / /'gro rgyud kun tu smon pa rnam spangs te/ /lus

'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas/ /phung po brag ca 'dra bar rtogs gyur te/ /byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs/ /mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang / /mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa/ /de yis bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par

shog /'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/

mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol/ /ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/ /

mgon pos de dag the tshom bsal du gsol/ /'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur/ /de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa skyed/ /gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs/ /gang gi sems ni mi sgul gnas par gyur/ /de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol/ /

de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing / /kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du lta zhing sdod/ /ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba/ /de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags/ /gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'dir bstan lags/ /

gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis gyur/ /de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis legs bsal gsol/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par

'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /de ring 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas/ /rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na/ /ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyod kyis legs

par mthong / /de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par byas/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas/ /'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos

pa'i sems bskyed de/ /'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas/ /rang byung dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang / /chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang / /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnams spangs shing / /byang chub mchog tu de

dag yid kyang btang / /rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnam bshig cing / /kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te/ /srid pa kun tu chu la pad mo bzhin/ /byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang / /de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba/ /stong par bshig ste thams cad

legs rtogs pa/ /de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste/ /byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes/ /skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste/ /de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas/ /zhi ba bla med byang chub 'thob par

'gyur/ /phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/ /byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/ /gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min/ /ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te/ /shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par

rig gyur nas/ /shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur na/ /byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya/ /mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis ston/ /smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /de ltar spyod na gzhan min

spyod pa yin/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur/ /rang byung chos la de dag yid ches te/ /zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur/ /gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te/ /'di ltar nga la mchod

pa rab byas pas/ /gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams/ /mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/ /de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig la yang / /blo chen de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod/ /de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal

ba gdams ngag ston/ /de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /mtshan ma med par spyod cing 'dong 'gyur te/ /'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas/ /'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod/ /de ltar brten pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas/ /byang chub bla med

de yang thob 'gyur te/ /de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur/ /sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can/ /de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas shes bya/ /zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi /tshe

tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur/ /de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'byung ba ni/ /rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs snyed de/ /kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med/ /de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig rten

dag /rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol/ /ngoms par gyur nas brtson 'grus brtan brtsams te/ /kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur/ /gnod sbyin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas mi'am

ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang / /gnod sbyin gyis mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la srog dang /

skye ba po dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang / bdag gi yang gang yang med la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang

yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar

rmad do/ /ci zhig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang /

zhing gi bkod pa dang / der skye zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur

ro zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di snyed cig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos

bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/ de nas mi'am ci'i

rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas/ /shes rab che mnga' bdag dogs skyes/ /stong pa nyid dang lung

bstan pa/ /bde gshegs bdag gis de ma 'tshal/ /gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings/ /'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang / /rang bzhin med gsung ji lta bu/ /mchod pa 'di ci gang zag mchog /skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub tu/ /sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu/ /

skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i/ /ldem po ngag de bdag ma 'tshal/ /mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na/ /'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung / /de ni yang dag lung bstan pas/ /thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum/ /sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skye zhes/ /gsungs pa de ni ji

lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /shAkya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal/ /gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la/ /dge bshes bsten gsung ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal/ /g.yo ba'ang ma mchis

bgyi ba rnams/ /rkang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal/ /rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang / /rtogs zhes mgon gsung ji lta bu/ /the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes/ /

shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal/ /zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal pa/ /chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu/ /mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag /bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol/ /sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams/ /nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu/ /chos

ni rab tu spang bgyis na/ /mi mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu/ /brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang / /'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang / /las de bgyid pa ma mchis la/ /rang las can gsung ji lta bu/ /bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang / /zil gyis mi non

bdag ma 'tshal/ /mgon po de la bdag dogs na/ /bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom sol/ /dge ba'i tshogs gyur ma mchis la/ /byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs/ /dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul/ /de skad bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal/ /chos rnams

zad pa med gsungs la/ /spong byed las ni zad bstan pa/ /tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang / /bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal/ /yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la/ /ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa/ /'di yang rab rib bral ba yi/ /spyan mnga' sdig

spangs bstan du gsol/ /thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par/ /gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di/ /sel nus ma mchis de lta bas/ /bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan

nas de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ /bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /gal te 'ga' zhig mi stong na/ /rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung / /ci phyir zhe na 'di lta

bur/ /rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na/ /'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste/ /de la 'phel med 'grib pa med/ /me long shin tu yongs dag la/ /ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du/ /ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis/ /chos kyi

dbyings ni 'gyur med na/ /mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes/ /yan lag rnams la brtag byos la/ /ljon pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod/ /chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du/ /'gyur med skye bo mkhas pas rtogs/ /byis pa rnams ni 'di la 'khrul/ /blo sbyangs

pas ni med par shes/ /skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed/ /de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po ngag /gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/ /byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba'i rnams/ /'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa/ /

log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ /de dag sngon cad ma thos pa'i/ /sems med chos ni ngas bshad na/ /byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams/ /'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang / /

byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas/ /zil gyis ma non rang byung sems/ /rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur/ /'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba/ /de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis/ /gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag

rtag 'dzin de dag la/ /'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med/ /dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces/ /bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston/ /sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skye ba/ /ji lta bu zhes dogs gyur pa/ /mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang / /skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad/ /

gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la/ /dge bshes bsten ces gang smras pa/ /gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gnas pa med pa'i dge bshes bsten/ /g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/ /bstan pa ma 'tshal zhes smras pa/ /shing rta'i yan lag 'dus

pa dang / /shing rta'i bya ba gzhan du rtogs/ /mi gang bdag yod khas len cing / /bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa/ /de dag la ni bya ba dang / /g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad/ /rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang / /rtogs zhes nga yis gang

smras pa/ /byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams/ /rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa/ /de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston/ /kun tu rtog pa'i rtog pas bskyed/ /yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings/ /zhi ba yod cing chos kun

kyang / /zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni/ /mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyis/ /kun tu rtog las sred pa skye/ /skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la/ /kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye/ /mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu/ /yod pa min la log par brtags/ /chu yin par

ni mthong gyur kyang / /smig rgyu la ni chu med do/ /de bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs/ /sdug pa min la sdug par rtog /byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag /sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis/ /sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te/ /smig rgyu la ni chu med do/ /de bzhin

gzugs la sdug pa med/ /gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na/ /byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can/ /sdug par rtog pas bcings par gyur/ /chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang / /spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa/ /med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa/ /mi mkhas rnams

ni skrag par 'gyur/ /rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na/ /bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa/ /de dag stong zhes thos gyur na/ /bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye/ /de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te/ /nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas/ /stong pa gya nom spong byed de/ /mi mkhas

sems dmyal chen por ltung / /mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang / /skye bo'i 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang / /las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te/ /byed pa po ni rab tu bkag /yang dag tu ni 'gro ba dag /rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis/ /rmi lam gang la'ang dngos

po med/ /log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen/ /ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan/ /byed po phyogs bcu rnams na med/ /shing rnams rlung gis bsgul ba las/ /me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no/ /bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes/ /rlung dang shing la sems pa med/ /

'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar/ /las kyi byed po de bzhin no/ /bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la/ /byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang / /legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni/ /de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos/ /mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste/ /de srid 'tsho zhes

brjod mod kyi/ /lo la phung por spungs pa med/ /sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs/ /zad pa med ces gang smras dang / /las zad ces ni ngas smras pa/ /stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med/ /tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan/ /yang dag mtha' ni ngas bshad pa/ /

phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'/ /log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams/ /yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so/ /mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de/ /mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi/ /ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi/ /nges pa ljon pa khyod nyon cig /yi ge

gcig gis 'jug pa yi/ /byang chub blo ldan rnams la bstan/ /chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la/ /mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te/ /'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs

su bstan/ /chos rnams thams cad 'gag med pa/ /a yis chos la 'jug par bstan/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa/ /de yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ /chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa/ /de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs/ /chos kun 'gyur ba med

pa yang / /a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag /ljon pa 'di ltar shes par gyis/ /mi zad pa dang zad smras pa/ /chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis/ /mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /

chos rnams kun la sgo med de/ /de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung / /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces/ /yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs

bstan pa/ /'di yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ /chos kun lus med byang chub ces/ /blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste/ /med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang

med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste/ /med pas de dag gdags pa med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste/ /

med pas de dag rang bzhin med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/ /gzungs kyi sgo mo nga las nyon/ /chos kun yid la bya ba med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin ste/ /bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su

bstan/ /med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas shes par bya/ /chos kun thogs pa med pa ste/ /thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs/ /'di yang gzungs kyi

sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/ /mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya/ /chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa/ /de dag ming med shes par bya/ /chos rnams yang dag ma yin te/ /de dag ma lus rang

bzhin med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas shes par bya/ /gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba/ /de dag mthong med bstan par bya/ /lta ba po ni med pa dang / /de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro/ /chos kun mnyam med de bas na/ /mtshan nyid gcig cing

mtshan gzhi med/ /nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste/ /chos kun yod pa ma yin no/ /de ltar lhag med chad pa med/ /mnyam gzhag med cing gnyis su med/ /gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med/ /blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro/ /drang po ma yin yon po min/ /mun pa ma yin snang ba min/ /

mthong ba med cing thos med de/ /med pas gzungs su shes par gyis/ /g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste/ /chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba 'ang med/ /'khrug pa med cing khro ba med/ /ci yang mi byed nyer zhi med/ /sgyel ba med cing gnas kyang med/ /'gro med ldog

med 'gro sems med/ /nyal ba med cing mi nyal med/ /sad pa med par shes par gyis/ /mig can ma yin long ba min/ /lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min/ /sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min/ /dul ba ma yin ma dul min/ /rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min/ /

'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min/ /bden min min de lta bur/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis/ /'jig rten gdul ba'i don phyir gyi/ /'di la the tshom gang yang med/ /gang gcad bya ba'i the tshom de/ /dam pa'i don du byung ba med/ /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal

po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa lung bstan pa dang / gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ /khang pa brtsegs pa shing la rten pa dang / pad ma la rten pa dang / ri la rten pa rin

po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang lda ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi'am ci'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba

phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ de mi'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod

nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs te rkang pas dong nas

bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba/ /rgyu ma mchis par

'dzum mi mdzad/ /lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu/ /'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal/ /zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du/ /smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du lta/ /bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig /

gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes/ /bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /mi mchog dam pa the tshom sol/ /bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la/ /dad pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das/ /ji ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /smra mchog bdag gi the tshom khum/ /

thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis/ /bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing / /the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par 'gyur/ /de ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /the tshom bcad slad ljon pa dang / /

mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du/ /sangs rgyas yon tan sten 'gyur ba/ /ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris/ /

ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa/ /bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can/ /de khyod dang ba'i yid byos la/ /skyo med yid kyis nga la nyon/ /'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa/ /de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas/ /the tshom gcad pa nga las

nyon/ /ljon pa la sogs mi'am ci/ /bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa/ /de dag nga la mchod byas nas/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong / /bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu der/ /lha mi'i nang du 'khor bar 'gyur/ /mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas/ /sems

la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur/ /mi yi seng ge de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu/ /sprul bkye rang ni lha gnas na/ /bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong / /bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang / /de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas/ /rang rang zhing rnams

sna tshogs su/ /byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la/ /mi yi seng ge 'jig rten mgon/ /chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas/ /stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur/ /de dag zhing du sems can gang / /yongs su ma smin 'ga'

mi skye/ /nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba/ /kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa/ /mi yi seng ge'i zhing der ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba/ /de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste/ /mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams/ /bdag cag dpag

med sangs rgyas zhing / /yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes/ /de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs/ /sems can rlabs chen de dag ni/ /smon lam rgya chen yun ring btab/ /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /bsam pas rang zhing rnam par sbyong / /nyon mongs 'joms pa de

dag gi /zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni/ /dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams/ /ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag /de dag zhing du rnam kun tu/ /mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /zhing rnams yongs sbyangs de dag ni/ /sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren/ /

de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad/ /lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnams/ /kun kyang yi ni rangs par gyur/ /mi'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas lha phreng ldan

glang po can brgyad khris lha ma yin rnams nas mi'am ci'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing bcom ldan 'das

la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man dA ra bas pus nub tsam du gang bar byas so/ /de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs

su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba/ /bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can/ /'jig rten bdag po mi yi stag /sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi/ /'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par/ /

zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan pa/ /thugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar dgung zla nya ba'i tshe/ /mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal ba/ /de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang / /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta/ /dpag tu med pa'i dge spyad pa/ /dpag

yas ye shes phung po ldan/ /gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can/ /blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal stug pa/ /bden bzhi mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel/ /rgyal ba'i brgyad chos dang ldan/ /the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog /sum

cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan/ /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs/ /bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/ /ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa/ /ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha

can/ /bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags/ /ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa/ /ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul/ /zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul/ /skyes bu seng ge bde gshegs khyod/ /gti mug zhi

bgyid chos brnyes pa/ /bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi/ /chos rnams 'dir ni thob par shog /ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi/ /bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du/ /'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang / /lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi/ /de

ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du/ /snying brtser nye bar bzung nas ni/ /'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba/ /srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi/ /bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig /'gro ba sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa/ /srid pa'i

rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs rnam par 'dren

pa po/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/ /stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i/ /rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'gro ba dang bgyis byung mthong nas/ /'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te/ /'dzum pa'i don ni

nyan par 'tshal/ /don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don/ /bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa'i mchog /dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod/ /the tshom chad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol/ /gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par bgyis/ /gang gis deng mchog bla med bgyis/ /su

zhig de ring gting thob gyur/ /bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum/ /de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas/ /dkrugs g.yengs kun tu 'khrugs par bgyis/ /deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang / /rab tu dga' yid ldan par bgyis/ /rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston/ /'gro ba'i the

tshom myur du khum/ /de thos bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams/ /kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/ /lung bstan rta thul khyod

dris pas/ /des na 'gro ba mang po yi/ /don chen shin tu deng byas 'gyur/ /stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par/ /sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston/ /de ni 'gro ba mang don du/ /de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus/ /phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis/ /nga la sems

dang nga mchod pas/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu/ /nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /'thun par mi yi nang skyes te/ /rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la/ /me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/ /kun tu bde bar gshegs

kyi sems/ /skyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur/ /rang byung mi yi seng ge la/ /tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis/ /rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang / /me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis/ /mi mchog rnams la

bstod byas te/ /de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing / /mthu bo che yi sku bstod nas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la/ /rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung / /grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba/ /brgyad khri po rnams de dag kun/ /bskal pa gcig la bde

gshegs 'gyur/ /me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya/ /de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang / /ngan song gshin rje'i 'jig rten med/ /zhing de na ni lha min med/ /mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom/ /phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/ /longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi/ /

ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med/ /de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag /mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos/ /de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi/ /skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag /gang gA'i bye ma rab

mang snyed/ /grol bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston/ /grags pa ma smad de dag gi /ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur/ /de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel la'ang / /rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /grags pa mtha'

yas ldan rnams kyi/ /ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang / /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur/ /phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi/ /lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa/ /thos shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang / /de tshe

sems ni rab tu dga'/ /phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa

yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de 'di lta ste/ dper na kham pa'i gru la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu'i dbus su phyin na gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol

nas pha rol du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes pa de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol

zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to/ /de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang / skar mdog dang / bai dUr+ya dang / gser dang /

rdo rje'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /lha'i rol mo sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri po de dag thogs nas rol mo sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum

skor ba byed cing me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab

tu gtor te/ de dag gis mchod pa byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi/ /lha ni dgu khri tham pa dag /'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na/ /thal mo rab tu sbyar

nas mchis/ /rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis/ /'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis/ /mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum/ /mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs/ /sred pa'i phur pa rab tu

phyung / /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsnyal/ /khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste/ /rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs/ /khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste/ /'dren pa khyod kyis rma rnams sos/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs thams cad spangs/ /'ching ba dag ni thams cad bcad/ /sbyor

ba kun dang bral ba ste/ /thub pa chags pa kun las 'das/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ni/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/ /bcom ldan khyod la smon pa yang / /rnam pa kun tu mi mnga'o/ /khyod kyis sred pa drungs nas phyung / /ma rig pas ni thugs kyang phyung / /rnam pa

bzhi po'i phyin ci log /rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs/ /gang du 'jig rten mi chud de/ /rngon pas ji bzhin du/ /'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba yi/ /yang dag mtha' ni khyod kyis gzigs/ /sems can 'jig tshogs ltar lhung ste/ /stong pa nyid ni ma

'tshal bas/ /ma rig pa yi mun pas gtibs/ /'khor ba'i btson rar dga' bar bgyid/ /khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du/ /'gro de chang ba stong 'drar gzigs/ /gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i/ /ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan/ /phung po stong par rnam par

bshig /ming dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing / /khams rnams dang ni skye mched dag /bdag med stong par rnam par bshig /chos gang dang ni ming gang gis/ /chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba/ /chos de chos des stong pa ste/ /thub pa khyod kyis stong par

bstan/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen mngon sprul na/ /de la sems can gdags ma mchis/ /srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar/ /de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang / /dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang / /yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes / /

skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad/ /ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhig gis/ /bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing / /mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang / /lci dang yang ba bstan bgyis kyang / /byis pa'i mig ni bslus pa ste/ /de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis/ /de bzhin chos dbyings

mnyam lags na/ /byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs/ /gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la/ /legs bslabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du/ /de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan/ /shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni/ /ye shes sgron ma rab bus te/ /chos kyi

'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /sems can rnams la chos bstan pa/ /de ltar bdag cag myur du ni/ /bla med byang chub zhi thob ste/ /ji ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ /'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu/ /'khyams par gyur pa'i

sems can la/ /ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos myur bstan/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom

ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi rgyu/ /dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol/ /skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag /bde gshegs deng bzhad mthong nas

ni/ /yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te/ /kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /de ring su yis bdud pham bgyis/ /nem nur gang gis bcad par gyur/ /su zhig de ring chos rtogs gyur/ /skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol/ /de ring khyod la su

yis mchod/ /ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /'gro kun nem nur 'tshal gyur na/ /rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol/ /ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis/ /lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur na/ /'gro ba the tshom 'chad 'gyur ba/ /'dren pas de

ltar lung bstan gsol/ /ci nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa rnams/ /myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /de ltar 'dren pas bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal

pa/ 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes/ /rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing / /nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis/ /

dran pa mngon byos mnyan par gyis/ /dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu/ /de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /shin tu dang ba'i yid kyis byas/ /sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas/ /stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur/ /chos rnams

la ni nges pa rnyed/ /nga yi bstan la rab tu gnas/ /sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag /brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod/ /ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni/ /bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur/ /'dren pa de dag ji srid du/ /sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod cing / /bsnyen

bkur byas par ma gyur pa/ /de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya/ /de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na/ /kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur/ /mtshan ni 'od zer 'chang ba ste/ /'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi /nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni/ /blo

yi mchog dang ldan pa dag /'dus pa brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi /mi rnams de yi dus kyi tshe/ /lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu tham/ /srog gi dbang po gnas par 'gyur/ /shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi /nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba

rnams/ /lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa dag /bye ba tshad med 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i/ /'jig rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang / /shin tu rgya cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur

nas/ /rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs brgyan 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/ /mchod rten de dag thams cad la/ /srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig

rnams kyis mchod byas nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur/ /rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang / /de dag dam chos gnas 'gyur ba/ /lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag /brgyad cu tshang bar gnas par 'gyur/ /chos kyi

rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis/ /bzung zhing yongs su bsrungs par gnas/ /'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /shAkya yongs su smin mdzad phyir/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams la/ /'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad/ /de thos nas ni skye bo kun/ /kun tu dga'

zhing rab dga' ste/ /sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas/ /ston pa la ni mngon par bstod/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //bam po drug pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi

lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin dag dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi'am ci dag dang / phreng ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /

lung bstan pa yang thos nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas yid byung ba chen po skyes te/ 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i

phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang / bai dUr+ya'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ gser gyi phreng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi phreng bas brgyan pa/

sa gnas rim pa brgyad dang / ba gam dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung gis brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i

tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan sgra rab tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to/ /rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas pa bye ba

phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul to/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan pa'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man dA ra ba dang / lha'i mchod pa de dag gis rgyas par gang bar byas so/ /glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang

mngon par sprul te/ glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu/ glang po che sa srung gi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug/ so de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad ma stong phrag bdun bdun/ pad ma

de dag re re zhing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri brgyad khri/ 'dab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i khang pa de dag mdun du byas te/ dbus su glang po

che sa srung gi bu dag btsud nas phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshams pa de dag bkye nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so/ /rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang lha'i tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ud pa la dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / gser phye'i char mngon

par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dza Sha ka dang / many+dza Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog dag gi char yang mngon

par bab par gyur to/ /gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/

la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang / glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu la zhon te/ bcom

ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phul bar gyur to/ /lha'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu

brgyad cu mngon par sprul te/ lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so/ /de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems

te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no

snyam du sems par gyur cing de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to/ /de dag de ltar the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan

'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar

mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis

mngon par bstod do/ /'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang / /sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang / /lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/ /de ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid/ /'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang / /de bzhin

gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang / /'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes/ /de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes/ /bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du/ /ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste/ /rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas/ /'di

la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/ /rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas/ /byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa/ /de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no/ /slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang / /bcom ldan

nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa/ /de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul dang 'dra/ /bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra lhur len cing / /bse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs/ /de dag rnams kyang sprul 'dra bcom ldan 'das/ /bde

gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ /gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang / /khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra/ /bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren

pa mchog /stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can/ /ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag /sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs/ /'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa/ /gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing / /sdug

bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa/ /de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang / /sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis/ /gang tshe gau ta ma'i bstan pa 'di/ /bdag cag rtogs nas the tshom thams cad

spangs/ /sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas/ /bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa'i rnams/ /the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa

gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhal yas grags mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid can/ /bde gshegs

rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na/ /rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tshom khum/ /rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di/ /byung bar rig nas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal/ /'gro ba'i the tshom thub pas bsal du

gsol/ /'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis mdzod/ /lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu yid dga' bas/ /rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod/ /bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol/ /zla ltar dri med 'od

mnga' mtha' yas gzi/ /ci nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas/ /mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dga' 'gyur bar/ /rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol/ /bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun/ /sprul pa lta bur

rnam par rtogs gyur nas/ /stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsol te/ /rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs/ /skye bo 'di dag the tshom bral gyur nas/ /thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur/ /rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur te/ /dgongs pa rig nas rgya

chen rtsom par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas/ /rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig /smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste/ /'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to/ /

lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa/ /des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas/ /'dzum mdzad pa yi rgyu de ngas bstan gyis/ /dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni/ /ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas/ /chags med ye

shes mthong ba dpag med cing / /rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe/ /mi yi gtso bo gang gA'i bye snyed mchod/ /srid rgyun de na 'di dag thub pa las/ /chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo / /'di dag nga la mchod mchog 'dir

byas pas/ /chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong / /bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni/ /chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod mi 'gyur/ /lha tshogs 'di yis nga la mchod byas te/ /chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas/ /bskal pa pad ma zhes bya

byung ba'i tshe/ /smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni/ /bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po/ /chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing / /'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grel bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs

de dag bstan la bag yod pa/ /chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems/ /zhi gnas de la su sten bag yod pa/ /myur du bla med byang chub mchog zhi 'thob/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe 'thab

bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la

thogs pa mi mnga' bar shes shing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob na ma shes pa'am/ ma mthong ba'am/ ma rtogs pa'am/ mngon du ma byas pa'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs

rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de/ shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen/ legs par

mngon du mdzad pas de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/ /don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs su shes

par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma brtags pa/ 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa/ nye bar ma bsnyen pa/

ma bor ba/ ma bzhag pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi ba med pa/ ma smad pa/ ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma yin pa/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs

med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/

ma bsams pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /

lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi

dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar gyi

mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma

mi dmigs pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma mi

dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang / de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes

pa rnams kyis thos na 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te/

de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/

rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs/ /khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag /kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa gnyis yin te/ /khyod kyis gzhan las ma

gsan rang gis gzigs/ /de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste/ /bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams/ /bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du/ /'jig rten phan phyir kun

rdzob de bstan to/ /sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa/ /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro dang / /lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams/ /mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad/ /rigs dma' de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang / /phyug po'i khyim

dang dbul po'i khyim dag dang / /bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs/ /bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang / /'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung / /mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ /kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas/ /

'jig rten phan pas mi la de bstan to/ /de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na/ /'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste/ /thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang / /bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo/ /thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed/ /ma thob

gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur/ /gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya/ /nad rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur/ /kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba/ /de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya/ /mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang / /bdag med

rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang / /mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing / /de la dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa/ /de dag bde gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na/ /'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar 'gyur/ /de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas/ /

sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong / /de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid kyang / /sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis/ /ma log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na/ /sbrul gyi pags pa rnying ltar rab

spangs te/ /srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur/ /chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes/ /gang gis thos nas dga' ba bskyed 'gyur ba/ /de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs

pa'i chos/ /de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ /de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol/ /byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams/ /skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol/ /de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du/ /bla

na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/

'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des/ /khyod kyi 'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na/ /'khor 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar

'gyur/ /rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la/ /bde bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te/ /drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod/ /'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu bar mdzad slad du/ /snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod

du gsol/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na/ /skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na/ /mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur/ /mi yi dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur

legs par sol/ /'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdod/ /lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol/ /kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te/ /khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la/ /sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan/ /'jig rten phan

phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na/ /

skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing / /'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang / /tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang / /gti mug blo can dga' ba mi 'gyur/ /gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la dga' ba dang / /

gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang / /gang rnams snying rje che dang ldan pa dag /de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'gro ba gdon zin mthong gyur te/ /mi yi seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos nas/ /ud pal phreng

bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur/ /nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur ba/ /sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon byas te/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di/ /me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta/ /'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la/ /

bsnyen bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste/ /nyon mongs dmad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur/ /snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan/ /rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang gA yi/ /bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bkur byas/ /byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing / /

dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas/ /sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje skyed/ /de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la/ /chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur/ /gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren

'gyur ba/ /rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur/ /mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas/ /de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad/ /rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag /rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad/ /de dag rgyal ba'i gsung

de thos gyur nas/ /'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs/ /cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong / /rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas/ /de dag nga la

mchod pa rgya chen byas/ /bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas/ /skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pa la/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag /nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur/ /blo gros dag

ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/ /sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong par 'gyur/ /'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams/ /rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa/ /rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yi/ /lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'/ /

'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/

gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig ci gzugs sam/ 'on te tshor ba'am/ 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam

par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang

'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang

gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa

rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i bar

du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / byang chub ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /

rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/

de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming tsam/ brda tsam/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam

ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las de nyal ba las sang na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rjes su dran na yang mi rnyed cing de ltar

mi rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos

thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu nor ba ste/ chos de dag gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhan to/ /chos de dag ni de ltar shes par bya ba yin na de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/

gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo yang dmigs su med/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/

rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ mya ngan

las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do/ /bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma mchis so zhes gsol nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos de dag la the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i

phyir brtson par gyur nas de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs

gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa/ /de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /rnam thar sgo gsum po ni rnyed gyur pas/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par

'gyur/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te/ /sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa/ /chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags/ /mi yi seng ge phung po dben la dgyes/ /skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi /byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma

mchis/ /phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan/ /de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing / /byang chub sems la 'ang de dag mi smod de/ /dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par/ /bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod
