khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/ khams dang / skye mched dang / dbang po dang /

bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings te ming gang dang gang gis btags kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis

kyang de dang des sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams

ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar

na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang po nyi shu gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang /

lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po

dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la

mig ni mig gis ma mchis/ dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /gang yongs su ma

grub pa de ni mi skye ba/ gang ma skye ba ni mi 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags/ dbang po ma

lags so/ /gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chang pa stong pa ni pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni stong pa yang mi dmigs/

chang ba yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du mig dang dbang po yang chang pa stong pa ltar zhing ma mchis la/ yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ gso ba/ gsog /log pa/ slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par

bas kyi/ don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs dbang po yang mi dmigs na de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gzung pa'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyi/ don dam par ni ma lags so/ /

dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang chos gang gis stong pa de la des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni/ pa/ ma mchis pa/ gso ba /gsog /log pa/ slu ba'i chos can byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa/ rang bzhin dang bral ba

ste/ de ni mi skye mi 'gag go /gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/

pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/

rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing

mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig rmi lam na rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran la de dran yang rnyed par mi 'gyur/ 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rmi lam

na yang mi des rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag ma thob ma rnyed na/ nyal ba las sad pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa dang / rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi

lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da

ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams

cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams

cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ som nyi ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du sdug bsngal ma mchis par rig

par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad du kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma lags pa'i

slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /

de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma lags la/ gang spang ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/ 'gog pa dmigs su ma mchis na lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis pas de ltar na

'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ni brtags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ gang brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o/ /gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /gang

dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ ma btags pa gdags par mi bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags

pa/ mngon par ma brjod pa/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ khong du ma chud pa/ khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi

ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du ma bgyis pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma

lags pa/ snang ba ma lags pa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma lags pa/ gsal ba ma lags pa/ zab pa ma lags pa/ 'khrugs pa ma lags pa/ dang ba ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ 'ching ba ma lags pa/ grol ba ma lags pa/

rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/ lam ma lags pa/ lam gol ba ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/

gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi gzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba ma lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma lags

pa/ gang zag ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa

ma lags pa/ smon pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma lags pa/ gnas ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/ 'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa ma lags pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ pa ma

lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ spang ba ma

lags pa/ bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa ma lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i

spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul yang ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa yang ma lags pa/ bgyis pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa

ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug

pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig

pas ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o/ /gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa'o/ /

gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum mi dmigs pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis

pa ste/ gzhan du na ming tsam dang / brda tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams gzung ba'i don du bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmigs su ma mchis so/ /chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma

mchis pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa/ tha snyad du bgyir ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/ gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ pa/ log pa/ brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ yongs su brtags pa/ rnam par brtags

pa/ rnam par dpyad pa/ ma zhi ba dang / rab tu spros pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba yang chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'du byed skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rig pa ni ma rig pa ma mchis pa'o/ /de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang

ma skyes pa'o/ /gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga la mchis te/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar

mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste ming tsam du bas kyi/ don dam par ni ma lags so/ /ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid

byang chub bo/ /de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o/ /de bas na

chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gags pa ste chos thams cad kyang ma 'gags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa/

kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjes su chags pa ma mchis pa/ khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de'i slad du chos thams

cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis pa ste/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la

la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs

pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas gnyis su ma mchis pas ni gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs

pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zlog pa 'am skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs

pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /

bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa'am/

gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni

ci'ang 'dor ba'am/ len pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon

par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni 'gyur ba ma mchis kyang gda'o / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba mi gda'o// //

bam po dgu pa/ de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges par 'gro ba brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo

sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub

pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa/ /'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan/ /mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod

pa bstan/ /khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi g.yo brnyes/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa/ /mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /phung po rnams ni

ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral/ /byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags/ /shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre'u thogs pa bzhin/ /grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par

'dod/ /khams rnams khams kyis rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /dper na brag ca rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra/ /des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings/ /grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams

ni khams gsum chags ma mchis/ /skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan/ /yang dag ma lags zhing byis pa slu ba chang pa stong pa 'dra/ /mi mkhas skye bo lam la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags/ /dper na 'gron pa rgya mtsho chen

por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung / /'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste/ /thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong / /mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags/ /bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog

chags dag ni rgya la thogs pa bzhin/ /sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na/ /mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags/ /mkhas

pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol/ /rten cing chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis/ /rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ /mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye

bo mang po bcings/ /mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar ba'i bya bzhin grol/ /thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/ /thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral/ /thub pa khams gsum mi

chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te/ /de slad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med/ /thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi

khyab/ /thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par bgyi/ /mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes shes smra ba dang / /gang dag rgyal bas

'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang / /gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan bzlas smra ba/ /de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs por yongs su dkris/ /gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du byed btang bzung smra ba

dang / /gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba/ /de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis/ /chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi/ /gang dag tshul dang

tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso bo dpal stug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags/ /de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi

mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa/ /ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas/ /kha cig yi rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas/ /'dren sras de dag tshul

'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par rtogs par thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir

de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dpal stug 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te/ /rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum

de skad thos/ /'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na/ /rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs/ /de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mdzad bsil mthong nas/ /'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde

gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs/ /de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa/ /de dag su zhig gang

gis ci 'thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul ba gsungs/ /mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrog ste the tshom kun tu bsal du gsol/ /de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob/ /bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de dag thams cad

gzhan du mi sems par/ /'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis/ /thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum/ /des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis

gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste/ /bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur/ /de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni yi rangs gyur te

'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur/ /'dren pa chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing / /rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste/ /tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par

'gyur/ /'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ /rta

thul khyod kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs/ /gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi tshul dang rgyu/ /de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing / /

rgyu las gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad/ /kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang / /kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang / /kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten

'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur bya ste/ /skye bo sdug bsngal lhung ba dgrol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya/ 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par

rig par bya/ /'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya/ /rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te/ /kha cig thar pa'i don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas/ /des na 'jig

rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub par 'gyur/ /rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur/ /'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub

par 'gyur/ /de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis/ /rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub/ /sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis/ /'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang

yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyis/ /kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par mnyan par gyis/ /dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub/ /'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur/ /blo mchog ldan phyir

'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas/ /rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad/ /gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la skor ba byed pa ni/ /

de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ /'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis skor ba byed par 'gyur/ /dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur/ /gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra

ba'i bde gshegs mthong gyur na/ /de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya/ /gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang / /gang

tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang / /gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum skor byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum

de tsam bstan/ /rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnams gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ /des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad/ /de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tshom med par gyis/ /'bras bu che ris lha

tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni/ /zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur/ /de phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan/ /de

dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong / /bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod/ /da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu/ /gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod

pa byed cing gnas/ /thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtogs rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas/ /de dag de'i 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog /'dren pa mthu chen yon

tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung / /rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te/ /sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya/ /de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de/ /

de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ /gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang / /legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur/ /'dus pa de dag thams cad

grangs med 'dus pa de ni ci 'dra ba/ /de las nyis gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /de tshe rgyal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ /de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs

de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi 'ang de nyid 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos/ /de tshe sras kyis gzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub

sems bskyed pa/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni/ /nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad

pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi/ /bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing / /yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin/ /mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa

gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te/ /thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'/ /bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ /de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo

la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de/ /rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byos la/ /yang dag mthong ba'i spyad pa dge ba 'di la kun tu bsten byos te/ /dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis/ /'bras bu

che ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tshom med par gyur par rig nas tshim

zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do/ /de la lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang / /

btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang / /rgyal srid btang bar ci smos te/ /sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa/ /rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /shin tu bslabs pas

mthar phyin pa/ /khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa/ /khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas/ /yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad/ /zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te/ /bzod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /

lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa/ brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te/ /stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa/ /brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/ /khyod

kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa/ /de la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ /bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ /dpa' bos shes rab pha rol phyin/ /yang dang yang ni

bsgoms pas na/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa/ /shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang / /don spyad 'thun pa'i don dag gis/ /'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul/ /

'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ byams chen thugs rje chen po dag /yun ring dus nas bsgoms mdzad de/ /sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral/ /gdos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu

dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing / /thub chen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas/ /ma dul thams cad dul mdzad pa/ /kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med kyis gsol pa/ sems dag mnyen pa'i sems

mnga' ba/ /sems dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba/ /sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen pa/ /sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can/ /blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs/ /thugs gsal

phun sum tshogs pa'i blo/ /mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sems ni rnam par sbyangs/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad/ /sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa/ /kun dga' khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /

lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom/ /khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang / /rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur/ /lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar

mkhyen/ /sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs/ /zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la/ /myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsol pa/ bral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa/ /chu bo rgal te zag pa spangs/ /pha rol phyin cing thang

la bzhugs/ /brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs/ /gti mug spangs pa zag med pa/ /sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa/ /'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i

bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi dam chos shin tu brtan/ /'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod/ /gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes/ /de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri/ /rlung gis

bskyod par mi nus te/ /de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ /bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so/ /lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam/ /mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can/ /shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa/ /rgyal ba mdzes

la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'/ /de bzhin nyid la rab tu bzhugs/ /yang dag mtha' yang rab tu ston/ /khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis/ /lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa/ gnyis su

med pas yang dag ston/ /dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon/ /gang dag zab la zhum ma mchis/ /de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin/ /lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/ mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag /khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa'i rnams/ /sbrul

rnams pags pa rnying 'dor bzhin/ /srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor/ /lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar mar me mar zad cing / /snying po zad pas zhir 'gyur bzhin/ /khyod kyis bstan pa myur thos nas/ /shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'/ /lha'i

bu zhi gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i/ /mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang / /shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag /'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i

sems mnga' zhi la spyod/ /cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhi/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa/ /dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi zhi gnas bslabs pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /

zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing / /sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan/ /shes rab chen pos de 'tshal na/ /de dag de bzhin

gshegs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par lta bas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs/ /mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams/ /ye shes mchog gis mnyam gzhag cing / /byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis

gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /thub chen khyod las gang slob pa/ /de dag 'jig rten snang mdzad cing / /sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsungs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho de thos

nas/ /de dag dri med bde ba 'thob/ /bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung / /lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog /thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs/ /de 'dra'i ye shes ston bgyid pa/ /de dag gang zag mchog tu

'gyur/ /lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis/ /chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba/ /de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen/ /lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa/

chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis/ /sems can

ma mchis phan tshun min/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams/ /bar snang lta bur snang ba ste/ /skye dang 'gog pa med par gzigs/ /de slad

'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu ngar 'dzin pa med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med/ /spyod med rtsol ba med par gzigs/ /lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol

pa/ sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis pa/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na/ /de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'/ /thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis/ /lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa/ gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la/ /gda' yang

de ltar ma mchis pa/ /de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ /de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu yid gnyis rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/ /de bzhin khyod kyis

bstan pa mdzad/ /de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa/ chos nyid la ni khor zug tu/ /spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing / /chos nyid de ni brnyes pas na/ /de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan/ /lha'i bu chags med blo

gros kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi chos 'di thams cad ni/ /rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen/ /de bas thub pas rab rib bsal/ /lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa/ mya ngan med cing nyer len med/ /spros pa med cing

rnyog pa med/ /chos rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams yang dag ma lags de/ /'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ /de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen/ /de bzhin

rab tu bstan par mdzad/ /lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa/ lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa/ /rmongs pa med cing shes pa med/ /chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa/ /khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/ snang ba

ma mchis mun ma mchis/ /gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min/ /gzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis/ /khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol pa/ yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa/ /yod dang med pa ma

lags par/ /rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa/ byis pa rnams kyi blo rmongs pa/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa/ /bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis

gzigs/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang zag sems can ma mchis pa/ /ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa/ /bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang

gis tha snyad gdags pa yi/ /mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te/ /chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing / /smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang / /

su la smon lam mchis gyur pa/ /de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/ rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing / /gang zhig grol 'gyur de ma mchis/ /de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /

lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa/ khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing / /bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te/ /bde gshegs khyod la smad mi mnga'/ /su smod de dag mkhas ma lags/ /lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs/ /

char gyis sa chen ngoms par bgyid/ /de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis/ /'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad/ /lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa/ thub khyod gsung ni don mchis te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /shin tu brtags te mdzad

pas na/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan/ /lha'i bu blo gros phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis/ /ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te/ /de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/ /gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad/ /

lha'i bu seng ge'i nga ros gsol pa/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te/ /seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas/ /mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa/ /seng ges phra mo bzhin/ /lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gsol pa/ bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de/ /khyod kyis

spyod pa spyad bgyis pas/ /sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod/ /bag yod pas ni nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab gnas te/ /khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel/ /stobs bcu gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos/ /bsam

gyis mi khyab rab tu spel/ /lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la brtson pas na/ /byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes/ /thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas/ /de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel/ /lha'i bu bag yod nges par byung gis gsol pa/

byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag /ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams/ /kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste/ /bag yod pas ni nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa/ bag yod yongs su ma btang bas/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /'gro ba

'di la ma chags par/ /thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung / /lha'i bu bag yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa/ byang chub lam la bsten mdzad cing / /khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na/ /thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis/ /byang chub dam pa brnyes par gyur/ /lha'i bu

bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing / /mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pa/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras/ /yab kyi dkor yang thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ bag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa

rnams/ /de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis/ /dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jig pas/ /nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil/ /lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshe/ /khyod ni bag gis bzung bas na/ /bskal pa bye ba

grangs med du/ /khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/ /byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang

dag par gnas pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste/ /'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'/ /sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/ /rdul 'thul ba la char pa bzhin/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu bzhugs/ /

sus kyang mi bskyod ri bo bzhin/ /khyed la gnod bgyir mi nus te/ /sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ /zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul/ /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te/ /'dod chags

kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhi gnas la/ /dpa' bo chen po bsgom mdzad pas/ /ci la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ /sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol

pa/ ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi/ /sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs/ /gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /chos gzhan de yi rjes su 'brang / /lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma'i zhi gnas ni/ /sems kyi

rnyog pa 'dang bar bgyid/ /zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyis 'ching / /de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs/ /de la chags med spyod

pa ni/ /rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan gyis ni sngon brlan te/ /shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas/ /de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes/ /de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren/ /lha'i bu zhi

gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang / /lam gzhan bdag gis ma mthong ste/ /zhi gnas ye shes che thob na/ /rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol ba/ dpa' bo chen po lhag

mthong ni/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste/ /de la khyod kyis sras spyod cing / /rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing / /rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sman pa'i rgyal po

ston pa ste/ /de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te/ /yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na/ /brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob/ /byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dod/ /

lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa/ gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu nges par byung / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis/ /brnyes pa'i dran pa skye mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/ yang dag ji

bzhin yang dag tu/ /chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na/ /byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te/ /de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/ mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing / /dka' ba mang po spyod

bgyid pa/ /de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis/ /pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du/ /rgyal sras gang dag zhugs pa'i rnams/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal cing / /rang byung nyid

ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la bsten pas gsol pa/ rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du/ /ye shes la ni bsten mdzad pas/ /thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas ni/ /srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis

gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen/ /'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi/ /'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa/ lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing / /chos

kun rnam par gzigs pas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te/ /sa bzang n+ya gro d+ha skyes 'dra/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste/ /byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing / /

skye bo mang po 'grel par bgyid/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /zhum pa ma mchis dngang mi mnga'/ /thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong

la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po chos kun ni/ /lhag mthong nyid tu yang dag 'du/ /rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na/ /de ni rang byung byang chub lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa/ sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste/ /chos

rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing / /thugs rje chen po shin tu skyed/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa/ byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i/ /'jig rten mkhas pa nges par byung / /de dag byang chub mchog kyang

'thob/ /grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'grel/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la bsten gyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos sten pa'i/ /mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste/ /sems can bcings las 'grol bgyid cing / /bcings pa thams cad rnam par gcod/ /

lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid la mos gyur pa/ /'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs/ /dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa/ /de ltar srog chags rnams la ston/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod

yul ni/ /chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /dpa' bos de la spyad par mdzad/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol pa/ skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la/ /'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs/ /chos rnams

kun la mi gnas shing / /nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ stong nyid chos la sten bgyid cing / /sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa/ /de dag ston pa mchod pa ste/ /mchod pa de ni bla na med/ /lha'i

bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang gis 'dren pa 'phags gyur pa/ /de ni yang dag 'phags zhes gsungs/ /stong nyid chos la sten bgyid pa/ /ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis gsol pa/ dpa'

bo chen po chos rnams gang / /mya ngan 'das min ston ma mchis/ /kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren/ /drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ stong nyid zhi la brten nas ni/ /khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shar/ /

stong pa nyid la gang sten pa/ /de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la sten gyis gsol pa/ gang rnams stong pa nyid sten pa/ /mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs med cing lta med rnams/ /byang chub rdul med thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i

bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ gang rnams stong nyid sten bgyid pa/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs/ /rang byung pham pa med par 'gyur/ /'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas

gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te/ /stong pa nyid la gang sten pa/ /de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag /stong gis dkrug par mi nus so/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med la dga' bas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la mngon dgyes te/ /

dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung / /mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med la gnas pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing / /zhi ba zhi la spyod pa rnams/ /mtshan ma

rnam par bshig rnams kyis/ /tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la/ /'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de/ /mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing / /zhi spyod khyod

la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gyis gsol pa/ thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni/ /mtshan ma med pas skom gyur te/ /yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod

pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pas/ /lha dang dri za mi dag kyang / /khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig cing / /

dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod/ /mtshan ma med la gnas par mdzad/ /de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod/ /mtshan ma med la rnam par rol/ /mi rnams yongs su smin

mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs su grub kyis gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa/ /de dag byang chub grub pa ste/ /yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/ /

lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/ /gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'/ /bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste/ /sems can kun gyi mchod rten lags/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rten pas gsol pa/ zhi

la spyod cing rnam grol ba/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med/ /'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten/ /dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas kyang lags/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing / /zhi ba dgra las rgyal gyur

pa/ /sangs rgyas rgal ba 'gro sgrol ba/ /de dag tshad ni ga la mchis/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/ mgon po gang dag smon lam ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa/ /de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung / /

lha'i bu smon pa med pa la sten pas gsol pa/ zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod/ /srid pa rnams su smon mi mdzad/ /sred pa yongs su chad pas na/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten yong mi gos/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ gang gis srid pa yongs

bcom pa/ /de dag gzi mchog skyes pa ste/ /de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras/ /rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas bskyed kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ /sred pa yongs su bcad pas na/ /srid pa 'jig

bgyid srid pa la/ /de dag smon pa mi bgyid do/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/ gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa/ /gzi ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba/ /de dag yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ /lha'i bu smon

pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa/ /de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgal/ /de dag mi skom zang zing med/ /dpa' chen khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med la nges pas gsol pa/ gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang / /bde

ba dngos po med bsgoms pa/ /mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yab/ /de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba/ /de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul/ /kha lo sgyur zhing srid sel

ba/ /sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ srid pa'i dgon las byung ba rnams/ /bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med

pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/ g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste/ /khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing / /srid pa kun tu smon mi mdzad/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/ thar pa'i chos la stobs

ldan pas/ /bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing / /khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag la/ /bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do/ /lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ lus med 'chi ba med tshul du/ /lus 'di gang gis mthong gyur pa/ /de dag sangs

rgyas spyod yul dga'/ /'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs/ /lha'i bu lus nges par sems pas gsol pa/ mi gtsang rul ba rnag zag pa/ /lus 'di mi bzad nges bsams te/ /yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas/ /rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /

lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/ lus la mi gtsang brtags bgyis te/ /lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing / /lus kyi sdug bsngal rnams grol nas/ /des pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/ /sbrul gyi pags pa rnying

bzhin du/ /rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku bo che/ /sku mi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus la smod pas gsol pa/ mi gtsang dri nga rnag zag cing / /rul ba'i lus la rtag smad de/ /mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas/ /

'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyo bas gsol pa/ gang dag rul ba'i lus skyo zhing / /rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams/ /chos kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i sras/ /de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lus kyis

skrag pas gsol pa/ 'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'drar/ /gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de dag lus las 'das pa ste/ /rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa/ lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste/ /ye shes

gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' bas/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag /srid gsum thams cad yongs su gzigs/ /lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsol pa/ lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral/ /chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas/ /kun

sbyor kun las 'das pa ste/ /rnam 'grel sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes mkhyen/ /khyod kyi sras rnams sgom bgyid cing / /mkhas pa byang

chub mngon 'tshang rgya/ /lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/ srid pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mthong / /mya ngan 'das pa 'jigs med mthong / /khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/ /lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa/

gang gis srid pa rnam spangs shing / /'jig la mngon par mi dga' ba/ /bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa/ /mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa/ /mi yi dam pa khyod kyi sras/ /srid par khrid pa rab bsal te/ /khyod kyi

bslab la bslabs pa dag /stong gsum 'di na rnam par mdzes/ /lha'i bu srid pa las rgal bas gsol pa/ /srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la/ /grangs kyis rgyun tu bgrang ba yi/ /grangs ni 'jig rten 'di na med/ /lha'i bu srid

pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste/ /gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/ /srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston/ /lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu

grol/ /rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal/ /srid pa mthar 'byin sangs rgyas te/ /srid pa sel la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gsol pa/ srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing / /srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs/ /brten pa srid pa mthar 'byin

pa/ /khyod la do zla ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi ba/ /mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'/ /srid pa phyir 'byin thams cad mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i tha ma'i

lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs nas/ /srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa/ /gang gis srid pa len 'gyur ba'i/ /khyod kyis kun tu sbyor ba mthong / /lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te/ /srid pa'i

rgyu yang de bzhin no/ /zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'/ /mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol du 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i pha rol rgal ba ste/ /srid par khrid pa yang dag bsal/ /rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas/ /skye bo gzhan ni

sgrol ba mdzad// //bam po bcu pa/ lha'i bu tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/ tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis/ /sems ma mchis shing rtsol ma mchis/ /bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis/ /tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen/ /lha'i bu

tshor ba ston pas gsol pa/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par/ /tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /rmi lam sdug gu'i dga' 'dra ba/ /de la so so'i skye bo chags/ /lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtogs pas gsol pa/ shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na/ /tshor ba

'gro bar ma song zhing / /'ong ba med la dngos med par/ /de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa/ tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po/ /rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs/ /zab mo blta dka'i tshig de yang / /khyod kyis sems can

rnams la bstan/ /lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol pa/ tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam/ /don dam nyid du mi dmigs te/ /khyod kyis sems can der btul bas/ /'gro ba the tshom ma mchis gyur/ /lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung

po mkhas pa po/ /mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid pa/ /de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa/ /rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa'i/ /

mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis/ /tshor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba las rgal bas gsol pa/ rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod/ /rgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las rgal/ /'dam la rgal cing sdig med pa/ /byang chub mchog 'di sangs

rgyas gyur/ /lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du/ /tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas/ /tshor ba'i phung po rab rgal te/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa/ mi rnams

dag la gang 'ching ba'i/ /tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur ba/ /de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pham/ /bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste/ /

sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par/ /thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis/ /sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin/ /sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de phyir khyod la 'jig rten

mchod/ /lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan nam slob ma bzhin/ /gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i/ /sems de khyod kyis yang dag brtags/ /de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul

la spyod pas gsol pa/ sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen/ /rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na/ /ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du/ /byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ /dul gyur las su rung ba yi/ /sems

kyi rang bzhin rtog med pa/ /gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa/ gang gis sems la sems med shes/ /mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing / /bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa/ /de dag 'dir

ni dpa' zhes bgyi/ /lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang dag sems la sems med shes/ /de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te/ /dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags/ /lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa/

gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa/ /sems can de dag zhi rab zhi/ /bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas/ /de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi/ /lha'i bu sems mnyen pas gsol pa/ mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing / /bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang / /khyod kyi bstan

la gang mos pa/ /de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing / /yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos nas/ /zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas

pas gsol pa/ gang gi yid ni chos nyid la/ /rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa/ /de dag mi dbang sras po ste/ /zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags/ /lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su/ /'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams/ /chos

nyid la ni gang sems pa/ /de dag spyod yul ma yin med/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la nges byung ste/ /'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag /mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags/ /lha'i

bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /chos kyi dbyings zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i/ /ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la

gang zhugs pa/ /de dag ye shes bsam yas te/ /sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med/ /sems can bsam la de dag mkhas/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa/ gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig /chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams/ /de dag spobs

pa'i stobs bskyed pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ gang dag de dag gnas pa yi/ /'jigs pa med pa thob med pas/ /de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs/ /de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung / /lha'i

bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste/ /chos rnams kun la shin tu mkhas/ /lag mthil skyu ra ra bzhag bzhin/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams rang bzhin

med gzigs pas/ /khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la bzhugs/ /mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te/ /bzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de/ /bar

snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la rton pas gsol pa/ gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas/ /skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa/ /de yi sgo nas chos dbyings ston/ /de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos

kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa/ mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur/ /lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod

kyis skye bo 'di/ /chos kyis rab tu tshim par mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas/ /'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs/ /lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa/ gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun/ /'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /chos dbyings rnam

par mkhyen pa yi/ /'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa/ mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te/ /rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po/ /gang la spyod pa de lags so/ /lha'i bu

gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam/ /de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang / /mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags/ /lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings

mngon par mkhyen/ /mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang / /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes/ /gsal

bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams/ /rang byung nyid du nges par byung / /lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i/ /skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs/ /rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas/ /de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/ /lha'i bu gnas

med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba/ /de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos/ /bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang / /de dag rmongs par yod mi nus/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa/ /

de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs/ /bye bas byang chub mi skyod ces/ /mkhas pa de dag shin tu dga'/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni/ /chos nyid la ni rab gnas te/ /sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni/ /

ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po/ /chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i/ /bdud kyi las ni gnas med de/ /gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma

yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/ gnas dang de bzhin gnas min pa/ /byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan/ /rang gis de ni thugs chud nas/ /sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang / /las 'dra

'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i/ /rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud/ /las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol pa/ chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni/ /las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen/ /gang gis rgyu yis bgyis de yang / /gang zag mchog gis

thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag na/ /mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba/ /de yi rgyu dang len pa dang / /gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten 'di dag gi /sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las/ /gnas dang las kyi len pa rnams/ /kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i/ /las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te/ /gnas dang

skye ba'ang ma mchis so/ /de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog /lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas/ /dus la rnam smin rnam gsum dang / /ji ltar de yi len pa yang / /khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod/ /lha'i bu stobs

kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas/ /rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /gnas dang rkyen

dang rgyu rnams dang / /rnam smin so so yang dag rig /thams cad stong par rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ /khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te/ /rang bzhin med par bstan par

mdzad/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ /'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste/ /rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/ rgyu dang rkyen dang las

rnams dang / /rnam par smin pa sten pa rnams/ /de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes/ /seng ge'i nga ror khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa/ 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis/ /khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pa/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso

bos mkhyen/ /de bas khyod ni do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing / /gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang / /de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba/ /de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis

gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing / /ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi/ /sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra/ /lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing / /bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed

gyur nas/ /'du 'dzi ci 'dra bgyid gyur pa/ /de dag bla na med pas mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/ stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing / /'dren pa de ni khams dang ni/ /'du 'dzi bshes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis

mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa/ khams de dang ni len pa dang / /bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa/ /de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa des/ /de phyir the tshom yong mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu khams la rten pas gsol pa/ sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i/ /

'khor ba de dang khams de dang / /spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams/ /mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ye shes gang gis khams de ni/ /'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi/ /mkhyen de mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes/ /bla mchog

mnga' bas yang dag bstan/ /lha'i bu khams nas nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis na/ /'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas/ /de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ /khyod la do zla ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su song bas gsol pa/

khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pas/ /yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang / /rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag /de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyid cing / /'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa/ /

de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen/ /de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod/ /lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pas/ /'gro ba ci 'dra mchi ba yi/ /sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang / /ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /

lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa/ sems can log pa nyid nges shing / /mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa/ /phung po gsum po de dag la/ /khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'jug /lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sems can yang dag nyid nges te/ /

ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal med pa/ /de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod/ /rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug /lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa/ ma nges phung por gyur pa la/ /gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams/ /de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod

kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te/ /de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang / /mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du/ /kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa/ sangs

rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams med/ /ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med/ /don dam nyid du bstan to zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs la gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas/ /des na de la 'jigs

med de/ /rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras/ /ji ltar 'dod dgur rnam par 'phrul/ /lha'i bu chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang / /de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang / /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang / /brda yang dmigs su

ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis gsol pa/ brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis/ /khyod kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs/ /lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsol pa/

nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams/ /gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis/ /log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror/ /drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis te/ /gang rnams ci 'drar mos

'gyur zhing / /'dod chags khams la sdug bsngal ba/ /de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /

de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /lha'i bu rkyen 'dis nges par byung

gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /gti mug khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag /ser sna

mngon par 'phel 'gyur te/ /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pas na/ /'thun pa'i khams ni rab tu 'byung / /de la

mos pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de dag 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol pa/ /'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/ /ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang / /mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag /khyod kyis ma lus rab tu

mkhyen/ /lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/ /gang gi rgyus byung nan tan dang / /mos pa de las gyur pa yang / /smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa/ sems

can gang gis khams gang la/ /bsten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi/ /rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/ sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang / /gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang / /dmigs pa dang ni

zhing rnams dang / /dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang / /sred pa mngon par 'jug pa dang / /srid pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i don/ /de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen/ /lha'i

lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ dbang po nyam chung rnam dag ni/ /gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal/ /srid pa rnam par gzhig pa yang / /rkang gnyis dam pas bsten pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa/ dbang po

rtul po dur khrod bsten/ /rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas/ /sred dang bcas pa khyod la lta/ /lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang / /zhi dang shes dang mi shes

dang / /srid pa zhi dang dbang po rnams/ /rnam par gzigs na sngon ma dmigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa/ zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/ /gnod sems med dang dben pa dag /dbang po rtul po sten pa'i tshe/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa

gzigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa/ zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsung / /sems can shes pa rjes su skye/ /zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa/ gnod sems

med dang byams pa dang / /zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma gzigs/ /dag dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te/ /des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/ /lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ log par rnam par rtog pa dang / /log par nye bar ston pa yang / /nyon mongs dam

phyir kun sbyor te/ /bzlog pas thar par 'gyur ba gzigs/ /lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste/ /bzlog pas snang ba chen por 'gyur/ /de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu

ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te/ /de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs/ /lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sems can gang gi shes pa gang / /

ji tsam yongs su bsgrub bgyis dang / /snod du gang rung ji snyed pa/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'gras pas gsol pa/ /nyon mongs spang phyir shes gang gis/ /shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa/ /de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de

bas khyod la mngon par dga'/ /lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa/ yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang / /spyod pa rnam par bsgom pa dang / /nyon mongs snyon mongs rnam dag pa/ /thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs/ /lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis

gsol pa/ dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang / /gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang / /bcings dang thar dang zad dang shes/ /g.yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rab 'bring rtul bo dang / /nyon mongs ye shes

tshor ba dang / /gdul dang gdul bar bgyid pa dag /khyod kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs/ /lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang / /rnam thar kun nas nyon mongs dang / /snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin ldang ba

dang / /rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsten te/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen/ /des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi go cas

gsol pa/ chos rnams gang dang rang bzhin gang / /chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin thugs su chud/ /des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/ log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs/ /rnam pa bzhi

ni skye bar 'gyur/ /las las skyes par de dag mkhyen/ /des na khyod la do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi/ /gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang / /bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /des na khyod

la do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar ldang ba dang / /snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag /ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa/

bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang / /snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin/ /bag yod pa las byung ba ste/ /de la khyod kyis ye shes 'jug /lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /bsam gtan la

sogs de dag dang / /ldang dang rnam par byang la 'jug /de ni rlung ltar chags pa med/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe/ /srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres/ /des na

khyod la do zla med/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing / /'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na/ /des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs pas

gsol pa/ sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag /blo mchog gsungs tshe gsol pas na/ /spobs pa sna tshogs rab mnga' bar/ /rnam par 'dren pa des nges byung / /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la byang bas gsol pa/ sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe/ /tshul

rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa/ /'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ /des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa/ sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la/ /dpa' bos sngan chad spyod mdzad pas/ /thams cad mkhyen

du nges par yang / /sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /

lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye bar brtag mdzad pas/ /chos kun sems can med pa zhes/ /chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen/ /'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsung / /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/

bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par/ /rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas/ /des na 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la dpyad pas gsol pa/ gnas dang gnas min brten bgyis nas/ /las dang rgyu rnams dpyad

pas na/ /khams dang dbang po mos pa dang / /bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas/ /stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po/ /dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel/ /

des ni 'jig rten 'di la gzigs/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sems can thams cad kyi/ /sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang / /dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams/ /mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod

pa la so sor rtog pas gsol pa/ thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi/ /sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing / /khams dang mos pa mkhyen pas na/ /de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su/ /

sngon gyi mtha' la brtag bgyis kyang / /khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mi mnga'/ /des na mgon la bdag mos lags/ /lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyis kyang / /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i

yon tan gyi/ /pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi /skye dgu sna tshogs las ldan pa/ /shi 'pho skye bar 'gyur ba dag /khyod kyis sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs/ /

lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig /bgyis shing rgyud drug mchir 'gyur ba/ /de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen/ /des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi/ /lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes

pas gsol pa/ khams gang gis ni sems can gang / /bsgos par gyur cing las bgyid pa'i/ /bag chags las dang sems can dag /khyod kyis g.yo ba med par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa/ bshes gnyen

ci 'dra bsten bgyi shing / /las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas/ /'gro ba gang du mchi 'gyur ba/ /thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dgos pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ las de yi ni bgyi ba gang / /dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /gang

gi slad du las bgyis pa/ /de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dngos po gang dag dmigs pa dang / /las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/ /

lha'i bu dngos po rig pas gsol pa/ sems can rnams kyis bsam mkhas pa/ /dngos de ji ltar gnas pa dang / /de ni ji ltar grub pa yi/ /las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ shes pa gang gis dngos po de/ /
