gtso bor 'gyur/ /lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud/ /dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dgar 'gyur te/ /de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye bar gyur/ /

de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grel/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro

ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing

chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub

'dod pa na/ /tha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med/ /de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin/ /g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spros sems med/ /khyim gyi blo gros ya nga mya ngan rtsa/ /skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba/ /spangs te de la mi lta rab byung nas/ /thar

pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed/ /dgon pa bas mtha'i rnams pa bstan pas na/ /shes khe 'thob pa kun la mi rton zhing / /lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la/ /seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal/ /byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na/ /ngan ngon tsam gyis

chog par 'dzin byed cing / /rtag tu bya ltar sogs pa spangs nas ni/ /'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no/ /dper na bse ltar gcig bu gnas byed cing / /seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin/ /lta bur sar 'jigs yid mi rton/ /de ni mchod pas khengs

par 'gyur ba med/ /g.yang sar ltung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ /rab tu thar bar bya phyir 'bad par byed/ /gal te bag yod dge ba'i chos spyod na/ /bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen 'gyur/ /mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab

bstan tshig smra zhing / /sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rnyog sems med/ /rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos/ /'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog /yangs pa'i blo can zhi dang dul la dga'/ /de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis

mgu/ /ci nas byang chub lam ni sgrub byed cing / /de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong / /gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na/ /yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bltas nas/ /gang zhig don du gnyer de

dgar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa/ /blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang skyed/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor

skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la sten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi g.yang sa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'phags pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la/ /de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin/ /de dag byas

pa mi gzo g.yon can te/ /rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs/ /rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste/ /de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dga'/ /kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltas kyang / /'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smra/ /de dag phan tshun sdang bar

sems pa ste/ /glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin/ /de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'/ /de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ring / /phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i/ /dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba/ /de dag mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang / /phrag

dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed/ /byang chub lam las rtag par shin du ring / /'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring / /'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni/ /de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyam par 'gyur/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma dad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul

'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po

de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ma dad le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems/ /de dag mngon pa'i nga can rtag tu khro/ /bzod ldan rtag brtson dge

slong mthong nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang nas 'gro tshe dbyug pa rdeg /pha rol mchod phyir 'di ni phrag dog skye/ /de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin/ /glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can/ /su la 'khrul yod gang la gleng bya snyam/ /de dag nga yi bstan pa 'di las ring / /

de dag yon tan dngang zhing ngan song gzhol/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni/ /ngan song shin tu mi bzad 'bar bar 'gro/ /de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang / /chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'di thos nas/ /rtag tu 'khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor/ /ngan 'gror

skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che/ /bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur/ /da ltar dal ba dam pa rnyed pa la/ /gal te thar 'dod bag med spong bar gyis/ /yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas

bsten par mi bya ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems

dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba'o/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang dag sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing / /gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed pa/ /de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel/ /dper na mkha' las zla ba yar ngo bzhin/ /dmigs

par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang / /bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dag /de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu spong / /gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer/ /gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos/ /'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi 'thung spong ba/ /de dag dper na ngan

skyugs rdzab bzhin spong / /gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ /zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags/ /rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa/ /de dag rnams dang 'dris par mi bya ste/ /de dag me yi 'obs bzhin spang bar bya/ /gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar

bya ba dang / /'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang / /de ltar sems can don yang byed 'dod pa/ /des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya/ /gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ /de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang / /grags dang mtshang 'dru phrag dog nga spangs

te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi

sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul

'khor skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang / /bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin gyur zhing / /'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba/ /de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na/ /des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed/ ya nga bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol/ /

shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod/ /gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la/ /bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'dud cing / /sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min la/ /chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med/ /bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos/ /sdig pa'i blo can

ngan song gsum phyogs pa/ /de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs/ /dmyal ba'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam/ /'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed/ /gang zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing / /mi yi

dpa' bo sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa/ /de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te/ /byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya// //bam po gnyis pa/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol

la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la sten par

byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su

bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing / /rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi bsam gtan sgom/ /ltar gyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te/ /glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin/ /khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang / /

gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems/ /ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa/ /mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'di dag dang / /skye rga 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod pa/ /brnyas par byed dang rlom sems

bor nas ni/ /byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod byas te/ /bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas/ /sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang / /brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin drug sa

dang yon tan dang / /stobs dang dbang po dag dang shis la sbyor/ /yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas/ /rga ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab sngon spyad tshe/ /sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du/ /sbyin dang dul dang des la rtag

tu spyad/ /gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur/ /bas mtha' nags su rtag par nga dga' ste/ /byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyangs/ /brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur/ /skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o/ /srid pa'i brtson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyams

pas/ /sems can 'khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni/ /sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed/ /'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs/ /bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing / /rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug /phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor sa dang / /grong khyer nor dang 'bru

rnams mang po btang / /me tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i/ /nags su thub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur/ /ka ling rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad/ /de tshe nga ni ldang ba'i yid ma gyur/ /nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i/ /thub pas bla ma rgas pa gso ba na/ /

mi yi dbang pos sra ba'i mdas bsnun kyang / /yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur/ /legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yang sa nas/ /lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur/ /ngas ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir/ /lus dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to/ /stag mo

bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir/ /lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas/ /nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyi/ /skyes chen brtson 'grus brten pa legs shes bsgrags/ /gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na/ /sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'ur gyur tshe/ /rin chen ched

du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni/ /nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas/ /rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes byar gyur te/ /rjod pa grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe/ /nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya/ /bsad par byas pa myur du thar bar byas/ /dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong

nas/ /nga yis phangs pa'i lus ni btang byas te/ /nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas/ /de tshe nga ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur/ /nga 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni/ /rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te/ /rang lus ngas

btang 'jigs pas phongs ma btang / /rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe/ /sman pa mchog gis nga yi ched du ni/ /mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang / /srog btang nas ni de dag gzhan la byin/ /'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad spyod pa na/ /rgyal bu mche ba

bzang zhes bya gyur tshe/ /chung ma ma dri khyo las mi 'phyo ba/ /bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang / /gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes byar gyur tshe/ /nga sngon lo ni stong du tshad bar yang / /bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas/ /nor dang dpal yang sngan chad ngas btang ngo / /rgyal

bu gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe/ /nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten mdun/ /mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang ste/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas/ /nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur pa'i tshe/ /mi bzad mig can khros par gyur nas ni/ /de yis nga yi mgo bo

bslangs pa na/ /de tshe nga yis mgo bo bcad de byin/ /nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes byar gyur tshe/ /grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo/ /thams cad du yang rgya che sman gyi rnams/ /de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go /srid pa rnams la spyod pa gang

gi tshe/ /nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na/ /bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis/ /lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas/ /gang tshe nga sngon mi yi rgyal po ni/ /rin chen gtsug phud gyur tshe me tog dang / /spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi/ /

cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo / /nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe/ /shing bal 'da' ba 'jam pa lta bu dang / /pad ma'i 'dab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i/ /lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo / /ded dpon seng ge 'dzin du gyur pa na/ /snying rje med cing

mi bzad rab gtum pa'i/ /srin mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas/ /rgya shug gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur/ /gang tshe mig zhes byar gyur pa na/ /byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa/ /srin mo dag la na chung 'du shes pa/ /tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar

bar byas/ /gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer gyur pa na/ /lha yi bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa'i/ /bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung / /sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na/ /dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi/ /rgyal

por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na/ /sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang / /rgyal po ud pal mig ces byar gyur tshe/ /pad ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig /yid du 'ong zhing snying du sdug gyur pa/ /'gro ba'i don du nga yis btang ba byas/ /sman pa'i rgyal po skra 'drar gyur

pa'i tshe/ /sdug dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni/ /bud med cha byad gzugs la blo nyams pa/ /ngas ni snying rjes yongs su thar bar byas/ /sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa ni/ /nad kyis btab pa'i nad pa'i mi mthong nas/ /nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te/ /mi

de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas/ /rgyal po me tog bzang zhes byar gyur tshe/ /nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni/ /nad kyis ring par gyur la rkang byin te/ /ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo / /rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe/ /rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad

ngas btang zhing / /phangs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste/ /phongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar bar byas/ /rgyal po phyogs kyi tog du gyur pa'i tshe/ /byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ /'khor lo'i mtshan can pad ma lta bu yi/ /lag pa phrugs kyang ma bltas rab tu byin/ /

rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe/ /snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod do/ /skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas/ /rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe/ /'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dkar ba'i brla/ /dga' zhing mgu ba'i

yid kyis bcad nas ni/ /rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no/ /bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni byar gyur tshe/ /bud med bkres skom nyam thag ngas mthong nas/ /gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa yi/ /nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang / /rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar

gyur pa na/ /shin tu nyams dga' ba yi rgyan mchog dang / /rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhon/ /gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma gtang / /rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral/ /rin chen phyir ni de yis nga mig phyung / /'on

kyang nga la khros pa'i sems med do/ /srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe/ /srog sbur dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur dogs nas/ /lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang ba byas/ /de tshe nga yi sems ni g.yo ba med/ /spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na/ /rgan la bsnyen bkur bya

bar rtag dga' ste/ /nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga'/ /nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med/ /skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni/ /snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste/ /gdol ba'i mi yis mda' rnams bsnun kyang ni/ /spre'ur gyur ngas ni mi de ma

btang ngo / /rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni/ /glang po bla ma rgan dran lus bskams te/ /shin tu yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos/ /de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur/ /bgrod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur/ /nga yis zhag bdun bar du bsrungs pa'i

mi/ /de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang / /ngas ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med/ /kha ba kun da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur/ /byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol/ /dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsnun kyang ni/ /mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa med/ /dum bu'i gling du

nags tshal spyod yul ba/ /sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe/ /mthong ba tsam gyis me ni zhi gyur nas/ /lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor/ /gyur tshe gang gA'i rlabs shugs kyis/ /khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa/ /de yis

gsod pa nga gan khrid de 'ongs/ /'on kyang de la nga ni yid ma khros/ /rgya mtsho'i dbus su son ste mgon med pa/ /tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas/ /bkres pa de dag rnams kyis bsad gyur tshe/ /ru sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan/ /nga ni byang chub spyad

pa spyod pa na/ /sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i nyar gyur tshe/ /sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste/ /srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur/ /srog chags des par gang tshe gyur pa na/ /nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas su/ /lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur

byas te/ /sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas/ /rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe/ /mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rjer ldan/ /mda' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de/ /de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa byas/ /dung dang ba mo lta bu'i

rta rgyal du/ /nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe/ /srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams/ /nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral/ /'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod tshe/ /'dab chags kun ni nga gyur tshe/ /'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas/ /

bud med dbang du nga ni song ma gyur/ /gel ba'i nags gnas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe/ /legs spyod ri bong tshogs gyur de la bstan/ /thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres phongs pa/ /de yi ched du ngas ni lus kyang btang / /sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas ne tso'i tshe/ /sdong po skams

kyang ngas ni de ma btang / /de tshe brgya byin byas gzos nga mthong nas/ /sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas/ /nga ni spra yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste/ /spra yi tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas

bton to/ /nga sngon ne tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir/ /sA lu blangs tshe mi yis bzung nas ni/ /ne tso ci phyir nga yi sA lu len/ /lo tog smin 'di ma rung byar sems sam/ /ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol/ /bdag ni rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len/ /pha ma rgan rgon

gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir/ /de la snying rjes bdag gis sA lu blangs/ /gang tshe thog mas sa bon 'debs pa'i tshe/ /'gro ba kun la cha shas sbyin no zhes/ /de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te/ /des na bdag ni rku bar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /ne tso legs so sA lu ci dgar

khyer/ /srid zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na'ang dkon/ /khyod ni mi yi nang 'dir dud 'gro yin/ /legs so khyod ni dul zhing yang dag bsdams/ /byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na/ /sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams/ /spyad pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang / /nga yi

yid ni skyo bar gyur pa med/ /nang gi dag gam 'on te phyir yang rung / /nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med/ /tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan thabs dang shes rab ngas spyad do/ /sha dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag /de dag rang gi

lus las sbyin pa byas/ /bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe/ /ngas ni de tshe lus ni skams par byas/ /gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi/ /sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa/ /sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te/ /sngon spyod tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug /spyod pa'i

tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa/ /brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang / /spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams/ /tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di thos gyur nas de yi tshe na ni/ /bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur/ /de dag zas dang 'khrig pa

lhur len cing / /rtag tu gnyid non khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur/ /rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la sdang / /bstan pa sun 'byin byed cing yon tan nyams/ /zhi ba'i chos ni thos par gyur pa na/ /'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes zer/ /nga yi slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor

gyur/ /mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin/ /de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang / /sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas/ /pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de yi/ /bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chung / /des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyi/ /'di la ma 'jug

'di ni nor ba yin/ /gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang / /rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa/ /tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la/ /gang 'bad de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /gal te theg pa chen po yod na ni/ /'di la bdag dang sems can

shing skyes med/ /gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa/ /de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas/ /rang gi blo yis rang bzor byed pa ste/ /dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni/ /tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi

'gyur ro/ /ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang / /khwa ltar spyi brtol che la rgod gtum zhing / /phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi/ /dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la 'byung / /lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing / /chos gos grwa rnams kyang ni skyog par byed/ /

chos gos thogs shing chad dang rgyags myos nas/ /grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu/ /de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed/ /bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas/ /de dag rtag tu phrin yig khyer bar byed/ /de dag ba

lang rta dang bong bu dang / /de dag phyugs dang bran pho bran mo srel/ /zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la/ /brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin/ /de dag 'phags min tshig kyang mi smra med/ /bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med/ /de dag rnams la mchod rten nor

dang ni/ /dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor de mtshungs/ /dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni/ /de dag la yang mi snyan rjod byed de/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa slu ba zhugs nas ni/ /bud med 'jigs byed mi bzad rab ces rjod/ /rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa

ltar/ /khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de ltar min/ /khyim pa mtshungs par de dag chung ma dang / /bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur/ /gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang / /lus dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba/ /de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags shing / /nyon

mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min/ /'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te/ /dud 'gro dmyal bar ltung byed ces/ /de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing / /de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi min/ /ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba/ /de dag slob ma tshogs kyang

rab ma dul/ /kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la/ /de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed/ /bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te/ /de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin/ /'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas/ /rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang

bskor/ /de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni/ /bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag sdud byed kyi/ /slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni/ /rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra/ /de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang / /lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug /rtag tu

'phags min mi dag kha cig kyang / /'ongs zhing lhags pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur/ /lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams/ /de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson/ /de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/ /de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs/ /de dag so

sor thar dang bslab pa dang / /'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur/ /de dag rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste/ /lcags kyo btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra/ /de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni/ /sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ /

nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la/ /de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang / /bslabs dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjed nas ni/ /rgyags dang nga rgyal dregs pa yongs rgyas te/ /de dag mi bzad mnar med ltung bar

'gyur/ /de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing / /rkun po'i gtam brjod pa la'ang rab tu dga'/ /nye du gnyen la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste/ /de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed/ /bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su/ /rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las

la brtson/ /gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed/ /de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma dul ba/ /nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla/ /bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te/ /dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes 'thun pa/ /gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do/ /

gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan/ /chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson pa/ /dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa/ /de dag rnams ni sdud par mi byed do/ /'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste/ /'di ni nga yi lhan cig gnas pa'i yin/ /'di ni nga yi dga' bar

byed pa'i yin/ /khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyis song / /'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de/ /mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la/ /'di na rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin/ /'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song / /de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba/ /nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin

te/ /de dag khyim pa lta bur sogs 'gyur zhing / /'tshog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bu de dag /kun tu smad par byas par gyur nas ni/ /de dag nga yi tshig ni dran gyur te/ /bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas/ /kyi

hud rnyed pas zil gnon yon tan sdang / /dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag /ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyis dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag /rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag

grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams/ /spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par gyur/ /'byed dang zur zer thab mo dga' ba dang / /yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed/ /de dag skye bo'i ston par grags 'gyur te/ /de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur/ /

'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba/ /'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang / /rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas subs pa dang / /pad ma'i rdzing bu yongs su skams pa dang / /

rin chen mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar/ /phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos/ /rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzad tshe/ /dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba/ /de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin/ /spyod pa 'di la sten

par dga' ba rnams/ /de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring / /'di nas shi 'phos 'gro ba dang / /dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas/ /lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa/ /mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste de yis

mi yi lus rnyed kyang / /rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag sten pa/ /long ba'am 'on pa'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur/ /lus la rtag tu sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur/ /gang

zhig ya nga'i spyod pa sten pa ni/ /de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te/ /de yi tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni rtag tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur/ /de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs/ /mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun/ /bkres dang skom

pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs/ /yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas/ /sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni/ /des pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod 'or la/ /legs par spyod la rtag tu bsten par gyis/ /'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur ta re/ /

gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang / /bslab dang sbyangs pa'i chos la dga' gyur pa/ /gnyen dang rnyed dang grags rjod spang byos la/ /de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis/ /'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / /'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang / /sdug pa

kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing / /'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtog la/ /pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/ /rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis/ /ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas par/ /de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams mi bya/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste

dang po'o// //yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ mi shes pa

dag ni mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par sems par 'gyur la/ zang zing la dga' bar 'gyur zhing chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / bya khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / nye du lhur len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas

rnyed pa sgrub par 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur/ de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes

par 'gyur/ snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi 'thun pa'i

chos bgro ba byed pa dang ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang bgro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos

mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na ye

shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong ngo zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang mi smra na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig

de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul ba'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs dma'

bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nad mang ba dang / ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor

skyong tshig gis khas 'che ba la byang chub ces nga mi smra'o/ /tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa

zhes nga mi smra'o/ /shes rab 'chal pa la the tshom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde 'gro 'thob ces nga mi smra'o/ /

khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /tshod

mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o/ /yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi smod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan smra la gzhan du byed

pa'o/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can/ /ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che/ /nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon

mongs bcas/ /de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring / /chags pas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel/ /le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams/ /dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams/ /tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur na bzang 'gro nyams/ /dbul por gyur pas rab

tu byung gyur te/ /mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar gyur/ /de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su/ /gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs/ /rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro/ /der song nas kyang gos dang nye du tshol/ /mngon shes rig dang spobs pa

phun sum tshogs/ /bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin/ rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song sa/ /mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang / /dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang / /mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin/ /de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos/ /

bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams/ /g.yang sa chen po mi bzad ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bskal ba bye bar thar pa med/ /gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na/ /de phyir lhas byin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob/ /rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya ltung ltar/ /chags pas kyang ni de ltar

mi rigs so/ /bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags/ /tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams/ /byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thob/ /de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin/ /byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba/ /dper na thar pa de

bzhin mi gnas so/ /de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar/ /nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o/ /byang chub don du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir/ /nga yis rang gi phangs pa'i srog kyang btang / /chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa/ /don med gyur nas bstan las ltung bar 'gyur/ /

ngas ni sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir/ /g.yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs/ /de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa/ /thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas/ /bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la/ /de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skyed na/ /chos min

'dod la byang chub ga la yod/ /dper na long ba lam gsal med dang mtshungs/ /yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ tshad med par gyur pa

de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don

grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do/ /yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer

nyi khri dang / khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do/ /yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rab

rim pa bdun dang / mig ris su bris pas mdzes par byas pa yod do/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes

pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po'i khang nang du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gter mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur te/ yul 'khor

skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad yi rangs par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag btson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer

des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu khyod bag yod par gyis

shig /mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig /gzhon nu mi rnams kyi srog ni chen po med pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya zhing las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'i tshe

lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /gzhon nu bag med par ni gyur ta re/ /bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re/ /bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing / /bde gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang dmad/ /nges pa gang

dag 'di na bag yod cing / /legs sdom dga' la ser sna med pa dang / /sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan/ /de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang / /'di ni da ltar dag dang gang ma byon/ /de dag thams cad

dge ba rnams kyis 'phags/ /bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas/ /bza' dang btung dang gos dang kha zas dang / /gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig rgyan/ /bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang / /byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer/ /rkang pa lag pa

de bzhin rna dang sna/ /slong ba rnams la rab tu bgos byin na/ /byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas/ /de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/ /rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang / /nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te/ /'dus byas gar

la lta dang sgyu ma 'dras/ /'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis/ /srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo/ /'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can/ /brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min/ /gzhon nu 'di la rtag med dge ma yin/ /ngan 'gror ltung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni/ /

pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med/ /mi yis dge dang mi dge gang byas pa/ /de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni/ /don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de/ /khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med/ /don med nyid

du ngal ba bsten par gyur/ /da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhi/ /mtshungs med go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir/ /rkang dang sha dang pags pa de bskams kyang / /de lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ /zhi ba'i chos thos

pa yang shin tu dka'/ /bsgrim par byas te bdud kyi phyogs bsal na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob/ /bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs bsten cig /sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/ /de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed/ /lam

gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed/ /brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te/ /lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas/ /rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan par/ /sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis/ /sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa/ /kun kyang go

'phang dam pa bla med pa/ /tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon par dga'/ /khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs/ /dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ /pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen/ /skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs la/ /lus dang srog la sred par

ma byed par/ /bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de ni bzung ste/ lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang rgod par ma gyur/ rtses par ma gyur/

dga' ba byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/ nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang / nor dang / khyim dang / grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de

ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig pur sems shing gnas par gyur to/ /nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jig pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang 'bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa

dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang / srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi 'thun par rnam par sems shing bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyis bdag gis cang mi smra

bar 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig pu gnas par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir sa phyogs shin tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces

bya ba byas te/ lho dang byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog shing dang / bla re dang ldan pa rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /lam srang thams cad kyi sgor

yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so/ /rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sprel to/ /rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/ /de dag rlung gis bskyod de bskul na 'di lta ste dper na rol mo

sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ lang tsho dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis khyed nyin

mtshan du glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing ci nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig /sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra shig ces bsgo'o/ /lam srang

de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas/ gos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal dang / rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams dang /

gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byin zhing skye bo thams cad kyis

yongs su spyod pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to/ /de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir khyim khor yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa rin po che sna bdun mig ris su bris pa/ rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas so/ /de'i nang du khang

zhig byas te/ der gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so/ /de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo / /

yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel lo/ /gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so/ /rdzing

de'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo/ /me tog ud pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so/ /khor yug tu rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to/ /dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang / 'bras

bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so/ /rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgya bskyed de/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sbrel cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/ /de dag kyang rlung gis

bskyod cing rlung gis bsgul na 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /gzhon nu'i lus las dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong zhes rdzing de'i steng rin po che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to/ /de'i tshe khang der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri

thams cad kyi steng du yang ras bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to/ /gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur

to/ /khri thams cad kyi drung du yang pog por nas a ga rus bdugs shing nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grems par byed do/ /gser gyi lda ldi bres so/ /gser gyi pad ma rab tu sbyangs so/ /mu tig dang nor bu'i dra bas bres so/ /nor bu rin po che'i 'od

kyis snang bar byas so/ /rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu sbyangs so/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya sbyangs so/ /skyed mos tshal kun tu yang nor bu rin po che 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te/ de dag gi 'od

kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khrung khrung dang / khu byug dang / rma bya dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / ku na la dang / ka la ping ka dang / shang shang

te'u rnams 'khod do/ /de dag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrogs na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par

gyur to/ /de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon pa nas nyi shu lon pa'i skyed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do/ /thams cad bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / 'tshog

chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to/ /pha ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bye ba byin no/ /nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba

mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa sha stag go/ /thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa/ glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ rgod mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa/ drang ba/ gzhon pa/ mnyen pa/ yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong por smra

ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas pa/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi sngo ba/ kha nas me tog ud pa la'i

bsung 'byung ba/ lus rnams las tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gnas so/ /glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra de la kye ma'o

bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang / bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste blta bar mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed do/ /de de'i tshe 'di lta ste dper na gsang bar bya ba'i mi yis gshed ma mthong na ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed pa de bzhin du rgyal bu

gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /grong khyer de la yang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /

bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag thar bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ de bzhin du sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg

gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha gzhon nu ni mi rol to/ /dgyes par mi mdzad do/ /dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so// //bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu

rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to/ /des las langs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam pa nga la

ltos shing smros/ /nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel/ /su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myar nga la smros/ /de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya/ /khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa/ /lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig /

'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smos/ /brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan/ /pad ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa/ /lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos/ /mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses/ /ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin

lus dman sems shing 'dug /de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan/ /glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes/ /khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig /pad ma rnyis pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman/ /me tog 'bras

bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tshal/ /sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra/ /soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin/ /dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'dir bu dga' gyis/ /khyod kyi khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra/ /ud

pa la dang pad ma dag gi tshal gyis gang / /pad ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan/ /de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed/ /dang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang / /ka la ping ka shang shang te'u dang ku na la/ /yid 'ong sgra ldan gangs nye spos

ngad ldang 'dra ba/ /thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug /gser dang bai dUr+yas spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra/ /rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba/ /gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i phreng ba

sgra snyan pa/ /zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra sgrogs pa/ /khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che/ /bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ /dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog /mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir/ /

rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis bu khyod dga' mi byed/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba/ /bu pho de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis/ /khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug /skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci/ /'dus byas

yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyer/ /yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa/ /'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ /thar pa don gnyer pa la smras pa yab gson cig /lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis/ /

bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags/ /nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa/ /sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung / /mi mkhas byis pa skye bo de dag bud med dga'/ /bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching

ba g.yang sa che/ /rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad/ /sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bsten/ /bud med 'di dag lpags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam/ /bdag ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer/ /khrag dang gcin dang

mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag /gsal ba dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi/ /glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi/ /dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid/ /kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis/ /ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo

lta bur nyon mongs 'khol/ /shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na/ /dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags/ /mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te/ /srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur/ /sems

ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus/ /srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod/ /'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su/ /'di na ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin/ /rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang / /gnyen gyi skye bo

chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min/ /bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste/ /sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod/ /mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung / /srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung / /'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste

cir mi rung / /rgyal po mkhas la srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan/ /lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig /byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul/ /'jig rten phan pa snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi/ /rgyal po bag med spyod

la byang chub yod ma lags/ /rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khol ba/ /de ni bsod nams chud za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog /'tshe ba shin tu rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi/ /skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur/ /khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma

'dra/ /zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs/ /rgyal po 'di na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra'i lus/ /chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'/ /rab tu gsal gnas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang / /'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas/ /

rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang / /gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang / /zug rngu rtsad nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni myur du sbyar/ /stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas/ /

legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi/ /ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi/ /long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i 'khri shing bskam par bgyi/ /rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas/ /de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'drar

mthong 'gyur/ /byams dang snying brtse snying rje pha rol phyin pa sprin/ /sems can bde 'brug lhag mthong glog gi phreng ba dang / /byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis/ /'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi/ /rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas

'dir mchis te/ /bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis/ /byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi/ /gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis/ /rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas/ /blo dang ldan pa su zhig

'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/ /mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar ltung / /byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag ni rgyun zlog pa/ /rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus/ /lhun po'i rtse nas

rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod spro yi/ /bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min/ /rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs cig myur du bzhud/ /yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol/ /gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas

mchi bar 'gyur/ /yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags/ /bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang / /grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus/ /dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na/ /bdag ni ri dang nags khrod

mchis te gnas par bgyi/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta

ste/ 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spangs so/ /khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyad la gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing bar snang la

'gro ba dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag cing skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras

pa/ lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar bgyi/ /su yi yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di las bzhud/ /tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas lha de dag gis

rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam/ /don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs/ /de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog /

de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stobs bcu bsam gtan pa/ /bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal ba lta 'tshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra/ /de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig /ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba/ /

byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri/ /de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ de yi gtsug tor de yi rtse la gser mdzes bzhin/ /dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ /

de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ltar lham me ba/ /nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil/ /spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ud pa la sngon po 'dra/ /mi dbang seng ge'i 'gram pa rang byung bim pa'i sgros/ /sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas

'gyed/ /stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems/ /de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag /bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub/ /rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi/ /de yi ljags ni

rab yangs rang gi zhal gdong khebs/ /rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don/ /shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gyu med pa ste/ /tshangs dbyangs shin tu snyan pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba/ /yid gnyis 'joms pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa/ /rgyal

ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa/ /yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag 'thun/ /chos kyi phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa/ /sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga' ba/ /mi ci ka la ping ka khu byug ngur pa dang / /rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan ku

na la yi sgra/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra/ /ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa/ /rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba/ /skul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba spyod pa dgar 'gyur ba/ /gzhan gyi spyod

dang 'thun pa zhus na tshim byed pa/ /chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di/ /ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum/ /dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun yang mtho/ /phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing

zlum/ /rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog /ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re re skyes/ /lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi 'dra/ /rang byung e n+ya'i byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i brla/ /zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo'i mtshan/ /glang

po'i dbang po'i 'gros stobs seng ge'i rtsal gyi stobs/ /khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i stobs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas/ /mkha' las me tog char bab me tog gdugs su gyur/ /gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos/ /rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug

bsngal dang / /grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ /pad ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med/ /mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags

pa thos shing chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba ya nga ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i

skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba ya nga ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa dmad pa dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa

dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang /

ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa'i 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar dga' ba

rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srung ba dang / ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid par mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan

pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pa/ rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can/ bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/

skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par spyad par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i

tshogs kyis bar chad byas su 'ong gis bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchong ngo / /snyam mo/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su phyogs te/ khang pa de nas

mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag la dgongs su gsol/ zhes kyang smras so/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/ 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go /'od de las kyang pad ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam byung bar gyur to/ /pad ma de las kyang

'od zer brgya stong byung ste snang ba chen por gyur nas/ snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad ma de la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang gzhon nu de sdong po

bcad pa 'gyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshigs

su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas ldongs/ /tshegs ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do/ /ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni/ /bdag gis 'thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa

ni/ /mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te/ /thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na/ /mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu/ /lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig /ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig /dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso

mdzad thugs rje ldan/ /g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shing / /dbul por gyur pa bdag ni bsdu bar mdzod/ /mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng dgrol mdzod/ /som nyir bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol/ /byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung

ston/ /chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol/ /mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol/ /rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol/ /sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung / /khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod/ /srid par

dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du gsol/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis/ /mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol/ /srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung / /dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste/ /bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs

'grub/ /bdag gis dal ba don rnyed gcig nges gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyad pa/ /'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston/ /

yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de thos nas/ rnam par thar

pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo/ /mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer

bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/ /gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis/ /

mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang / /khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di na ri rgyal bzhin/ /gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes/ /kun da zla ba kha

ba dung ltar dkar/ /thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa/ /spyan mchog bzang po ud pal sngon po 'dra/ /rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /de yis rang gi zhal gyi

gdong yang khebs/ /chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar mdzad/ /'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra/ /bcu dang sum cu snyoms shig thags bzang ba/ /'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/ /

bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid/ /'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag /bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil du brlag /e n+ya'i byin pa mnyam med

bcom ldan 'das/ /glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs/ /bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs/ /sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan khyod sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /khyod kyi lpags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog

'dra/ /'gro bas gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/ /khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan/ /khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad/ /khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/ /sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan/ /

mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/ /khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan/ /khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'/ /mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni smra

ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms/ /khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs/ /khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel/ /mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag /pad ma chus ltar srid pa gsum mi gos/ /

khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la ping ka'i skad/ /srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / /gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang / /bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med/ /chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra

bar mkhyen/ /stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul/ /ma shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyams gyur te/ /thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis/ /de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags/ /'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis/ /skrag par

gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te/ /bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing / /zla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non/ /sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas/ /rtag tu na ba'i 'gro rnams gzigs

nas ni/ /thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu/ /dud 'gro dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su/ /'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/ /glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis/ /de la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad/ /

gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa/ /'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi/ /chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ /'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog /tshangs las lhag par

mchog tu dga' bgyid pa/ /dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog /sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad/ /bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis/ /yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung / /de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya

dag /theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid/ /khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni/ /rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yi 'thob/ /mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa/ /phyug cing nor che 'byor ba chen por 'gyur/ /mtshungs med khyod la dang

pa bskyed pas ni/ /gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba mchog /'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa/ /rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni/ /tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten

bdag po dang / /yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang / /gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa/ /mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang / /thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te/ /

gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa/ /'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog /bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam/ /bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral 'god pa/ /bsod nams gter khyod

bsod nams don gnyer ba'i/ /bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te/ /byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa/ /yongs su dag cing mdzes pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i zhing du

lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mchod mi yis 'di la sogs/ /yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba dang / /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter 'thob 'gyur/ /khyod kyi brjod

dang grags pa rgya chen po/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i phreng ba ni/ /bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs/ /rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa/ /mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan

pa/ /bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi dgyes pa/ /mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas/ /dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur te/ /dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye/ /

lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs/ /yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas/ /bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa des/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog /yul 'khor skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan

gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi 'khor du ngu ba'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed ci'i phyir du/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams

kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des rgyal

po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo / /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon

nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi cha ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis/ /

sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur/ /skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/ /yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag /lhun po rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongs su dag /

rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam lags gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /blta sdug gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad/ /sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam

gyis mi khyab mdzad/ /des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags/ /chu shel nor bu

glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags/ /'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston/ /chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags/ /rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gda' ma lags/ /khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na

yang bzhugs par gda'/ /'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dkar glang por gyur nas ni/ /dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad/ /thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs/ /bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste/ /sa 'ga' dag tu

gom pa bdun por gda' ba mdzad/ /nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lta/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang phyung / /thub khyod chos gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang / /yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi

ba brnyes gyur kyang / /kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par gda'/ /yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med rnams kyang btang / /gnyan rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing ngu / /sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas yongs bskor nas/ /nags gnas gnas gcig po nas 'byung bar gda' ba

'ang mdzad/ /khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang / /zhing na bdud 'dul ba yang gda' ba ston par mdzad/ /sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskor gyur kyang / /khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad/ /rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs

nas/ /mya ngan 'da' zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsung / /rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/ /khyod ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung / /khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med/ /thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs/ /phyogs

rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung / /kun du spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi bgyi ba sgyu ma ltar gda' yang / /thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags/ /sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon

par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa/ /lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod ni legs par gsung / /bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas/ /mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi/ /mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba/ /srid

gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig /bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams dam pa gang bsgrubs des/ /'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog /yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des rgyal po 'od zer de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen

nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis pha

ma de gnyis dang grogs de dag dang bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig /de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong

de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to/ /dge slong de

dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chag sa bshams pa steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub pa/ me tog pad ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos

bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin pa de phyi de nyin mi sbyin gyi nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so/ /de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur bdag la

dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so/ /bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te lus dang srog la yang mi lta na

dngos po gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa de la de lan gnyis su ma zhus so/ /bar skabs der khrus ma byas mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus rkang ba ma bkrus ngal ba'i 'du

shes ma bskyed do/ /zan za ba dang bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to/ /gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhen pa byas so/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa

phyogs de nyid du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas rgyu rkyen thams cad bsogs te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i

bar du byas so/ /mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so/ /mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres so/ /mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo/ /mchod rten thams cad la yang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo/ /'dzam
